Lovely morning!. Such a great morning with really helpful staff. They had a great range of books which were used as inspiration to design the jewellery you would like. Silver turns out really shiny - overall great value for money

A must do!. Such a wonderful experience! Me and my friend Hannah really evlnjoyed this and would have stayed for a second class if we could. The staff were super helpful, encouraging and patient. Really creative and a different traditional experience. Dont miss out!

Great experience! . One of the best things we did in Ubud! The experience we had in making our own piece of silver jewelry was amazing! Topping it off to having the best souvenir to remind us of our stay in Bali. Wayan and the staff were all very helpful. We enjoyed every step of the process and the fulfillment we got when we finally saw our finished products were unexplainable! I would highly recommend this class to anyone who wishes to make their stay in Bali a little more special! Sempurna!!!

Great experience. Wayan made certain the silver pieces we designed came out looking just like we wanted and even better than we could have hoped for.
The process was relatively simple and a great value to get the best Bali souvenir I'll treasure forever.

An Amazing Experience!. The silver-making class at Chez Monique was one of my favourite experiences in Bali. Wayan is a fantastic instructor and has a great eye for detail. The class is a good balance of completing the piece yourself and having some assistance to ensure that you are actually happy with what you have created. I made a beautiful ring during the class and am quite pleased with it. I will definitely be back! One tip- if you are interested in making a simple ring with a crystal, buy the crystal beforehand from a local shop and bring it to the class as Wayan and his crew can help you incorporate the crystal into a stunning piece.

June 2016. Start the class with a warm hug from Wayan. He is a wonderful soul. Happy and helpful. I attended Wayan's class with my daughter. I am 53yo, my daughter is 21yo. Easily cater for wide range of age groups. Firstly you choose a design of a ring or pendant from the many ideas/pictures Wayan has in his folders, or design one unique to you! It really is easy, you will be surprised what you are capable of in crafting your own piece of jewellery. instructions are clear and the whole experience was wonderful. The cost was more than fair. My daughter made a ring exactly like a pandora piece! With a pearl! Sterling silver. Quality. Cannot say enough good things about our experience. A Must Do! Definetly go again and again!

Different, unique experience. Well worth the visit. After initially being sceptical about going on a silver making class, this was one of the highlights of our trip to Bali. It was a really interesting way to spend a few hours outside of the heat with some expert guidance from the people organising the class. Really affordable and additional pieces were a fraction of what you'd spend in the UK, but of an equally high standard. I, not the most creative, but there were some amazing pieces designed by the people involved in the class. Would recommend to any visitors.

The best thing to do!. Spend a few hours making your own jewellery. You get 10g of silver and get to make and design your own jewellery. A ton of fun and great token to remember Ubud by. They guys working there are very nice and helpful.

Great Sense of Accomplishment!. As someone who's very interested in arts, I decided to give this class a try. I went with a simple design. I carved the silver, bent it, and even coated the finishing myself! Mr. Mogi helped me greatly through it and he always, always, lent a hand whenever I need him. I also get to meet new people in the class. I walked out of the class with a great sense of accomplishment. Recommended!

creating silver memories. Our yoga group visited Wyan and his silversmiths at Chez Monique. We were all able to create a piece of jewellery under the guidance of Wyan and his professional, patient, skillfull staff which became a beautiful souvenir of our extraordinary week in this beautiful town. I created a replacement for a lost wedding ring and a pendant for my daughter. I was encouraged with my ideas and assisted with some of the more complex processes and the finished products are keepsakes made with much love and full of meaning for me. I absolutely LOVED this day and would highly recommend it to anyone, no matter your talent or artistic ability. One of the best days ever .

Best class. I come with no idea and went with a beautiful bracelet. First i could choose what i wanted from lots of maps with ideas. Then i drew it and then cut it out of silver. It was amazing how it works. Wayan was really helpful but still you did almost everything alone. The final product is so beautiful and nice. Really recommend it!

Go and get creative. I absolutely loved this class today, Wayan and his team are super friendly and patient and really help you along the way. I made a small ring as this is the style I like but there are so many things you could make. Go with a bit of an idea of what you would like and they will help you do the rest. Definitely get your creative gloves on and give this a go as it is so much fun!

Great Workshop.. A group of 7 of us spent a few hours here yesterday & were very pleased with the outcome. Wayan & his staff were very helpful but let us have plenty of hands on silver smithing. The end products were so lovely & we are all thrilled.

Ms. Absolutely loved the class. I ended up making a beautiful pendant with an opal I had brought from Australia. Everyone there was so helpful and knowledgable - but they also let you work your piece by yourself. It felt like YOU were the one who made something. It's a good idea to know what you want to make before going to the class.I would definitely recommend this class :)

This silver class can cater to all levels of experience. I went with some thing in mind that I wanted to make, which to be honest was much too difficult for my ability, however at Chez Monique they helped me to make my lovely earings. They explained the process and during the hands on class I was not left floundering as they helped me with parts of the process that a skilled craftsman needed to do. I would recommend that you go with a bit of an idea of what you want to make and they really help you to go home with something beautiful.
Great silver class. Perfect silver class and Wayan did everything to help me make my ring design come true. Would def. go there again!

Chez Monique were warm and welcoming. It was amazing experience and a great place to make jewellery as a gift.. Visiting Chez Monique Silver Smith Class was a great experience. We found a warm welcome here and everyone was helpful when we were making of our jewellery. The atmosphere was relaxed and it was a tranquil place to be. We were able to take our time and there was no hurry to get the jewellery finished. Drinks were offered on a regular basis. We made personalised jewellery for ourselves and also as a gift for family. We went back on two occasions. Thank you to all of you for making this a memorable visit.

What a surprise and lovely day spent at Chez Monique. Didn't know what to expect, was mainly going there to accompany the wife to a crafts class.Ended up creating a superb necklace for my mother that all (myself included) just could not believe that I had made with my own two hands (with the help of the kind silver smith that was assigned to us)We arrived there not really knowing what was going to happen and were told to look at some image catalog to get ideas of what we were going to create.I just could not imagine what would come out of this and I was told not to worry and that I would be guided through the creation process.After 5-6 hours I had in my hands my own creation that just could not have imagined I could have ever done before that day.It is definitely worth experiencing this activity once in your life and the staff are super kind and helpful.Attaching the necklace that I created to this review and keep in mind that I work in IT :)Husbands, trust me, this may uncover a sleeping Silver smith in you
Lovely people and activity. Wyan made us feel at home from the get go. Clean, helpful staff and a joy from beginning to end. We will be back soon.
Such a fun day!. We had such a good time here! Really want to go back again and make some more jewellery! Sumarta was so lovely and so we're all his colleagues

Patient, fun and accommodating experience for custom silver jewelry - great experience for all ages . I highly recommend this silver making class for solo travelers, groups and kids of all ages. Wayan, the manager, was friendly, kind, patient and complimentary of my final design. He has a good spirit that made the 4 hours I spent there feel like a lot less. He really taught me how to make the jewelry and took the time to show me how to design, cut, sand and refine the pieces. I decided to custom make two pairs of earrings, even though they have lots of stock images and ideas you can work with. While I was there, a young boy and woman drew custom designs that Wayan and his team not only accommodated, but made fun. Wayan worked with both of them to make truly beautiful pendants. For what it was, the prices seemed very reasonable: $35 for the experience, and $22 each for my earrings. Wayan charges by the amount of silver used so bracelets would have been more. Great activity for all!!

"Fabulous day making my own unique jewellery pieces!!! Highly Recommended!!!". "A very skilled team of jewellery makers!!!" I thoroughly enjoyed my two days making jewellery with Wayan and his staff. Everyone was so welcoming, helpful, skilled and beautiful to be around. I ended staying 2 days and making 4 pieces of jewellery in a warm relaxed atmosphere. I can't wait to go back and make more. A very inspiring workshop which definitely won't disappoint!!! I've been recommending Chez Monique and talking about them ever since. I can't thank them enough. Thankyou once again!!! Lisa Duggan XXXXX

Best silver jewellery class. Booked a class with Wayan on the recommendation of friends. Thoroughly enjoyed the course - the support and interaction of Wayan and his staff was excellent. Recommend this for anyone to have a different experience in Bali.
Very Nice course!. A lot is possible to make, they are really skilled. But you also do a lot yourself, which is great offcourse! The place where you work looks Nice and professional.

Best Silver jewellery class!. Booked a class with Wayan on the recommendation of friends from home. We were certainly not disappointed. Wayan and his team are patient teachers and the balance of teaching versus demonstrating and assistance was just right. We left with 6 totally unique pieces and felt the value for money was just right.
Making jewellery. Very friendly staff. You can design and partially make you're own jewellery. I left the hard stuff to the professionals. Great experience.

A very inspiring experience. Great for kids too !. My family and I visited the Silver Master Class while staying in Ubud and the kids absolutely loved the experience. Learning from the Silversmith Master, the outcome was no short of amazing. Super pedagogical in a very relaxing environment. Do not forget to visit the shop in town.

Fantastic experience!. I had this place recommended by a friend and it was well worth the visit. You design, shape, solder and polish - all yourself with their expert help. I was thrilled with the result! They also offered to polish a ring i was wearing which came up beautifully!! A lovely thing to do on a Bali morning!! Thank you!!

Super experience. My sister and I have just been to Chez Monique for a silver making class. We had a super time and despite neither of us being very creative we were able to produce a beautiful ring and pendent. Everyone working at Chez Monique was so enthusiastic, friendly and able to teach and help us when we needed it. The lovely environment and satisfaction of producing a piece of jewellery made it one of our favourite Bali experiences. It is definitely an opportunity not to miss.

Perfection as always. We recently attended our 4th silversmith course with Wayan Sunarta from Cez Monique. It is just such a wonderful and relaxing experience and the beauty is that you walk away with something you designed and made. If you are traveling to Ubud and have a couple of hours to spare, do yourself a favour and book in for a course. I promise you, you will not regret it.

Relaxing, beautiful experience. I came on the recommendation of a friend who had been, and it was possibly the best experience I had in Ubud! I made a beautiful silver ring, and the people working here helped me but also let me take the lead and take full ownership of what I was making. It was the perfect balance of being taught, having a go and being shown how to do it. It was a really relaxed atmosphere tucked away in a little secluded spot in Ubud, but super easy to get to. I'll definitely be back here the next time I'm in Ubud.

Awesome Experience . My wife and I went to Bali for our honeymoon and had a great time at Chez Monique's Silver Making Class! They were very patient and the atmosphere was breathtaking. Everyone was extremely helpful and patient. They did a great job at teaching us the necessary skills that we needed in order to make the piece of jewelry of our choice. We were very satisfied and wish we could go back again!

Amazing class.. This was such an amazing experience! I made a ring for my fiancé. He loves it! The guys there really know what they are doing, and can accomplish any design! Wayan is a lovely man and is there to show and guide u!

That was great experience. I made myself ring and I love it more and more each day. Its very fun and rather unusual way to spend your day. Great memories and story to tell your friends. Highly recommend!

An insightful and fascinating afternoon. We spent the afternoon with Wayan at his silversmith class and it was fascinating to learn about the way silver is made into jewelry. You can choose from many designs they have on hand or make your own design. Wayan in very interesting and friendly person and you will also have the opportunity to visit a typical Balines household. I fully recommend this class, we had a great time.

Excellent experience, however...... If you fancy doing something a little different on your holiday then I'd certainly recommend going to Chez Monique and giving your artistic side a little workout. You design, craft and ultimately wear your creation with expert guidance.Our only small criticism was that we were not made aware that making a set of earrings cost more than the advertised price.

Great fun!. I did the silversmithing class with 2 friends and we were lucky enough to have our own private class. Wayan's team were very helpful and gave a great insight into the skill involved in making silver jewellery. I came away with a beautiful pendant which they really helped me to perfect. I would really recommend choosing this class if you come to ubud and its walking distance from the market.

Wonderfully creative experience. A simple design with the help of experienced artists is turned into a beautiful piece of jewellery. A wonderful few hours were spent in this studio. Very helpful and friendly staff, their skills ensuring the piece you take away with you is of a high standard. Highly recommended if you would like to have a taste of creating your own jewellery. You will certainly come away with a much better appreciation of the time and skill it takes to create the beautiful silver work for sale in the shops.

A great experience!. Myself and my boyfriend had a great time making our own jewellery! The team were really helpful and provided loads of great design ideas to chose from as well as being open to creating our own designs.We got to do a lot of the making ourselves, with help from the professionals for the complicated bits. I would highly recommend this as a morning activity whilst in ubud!! Thanks!

The best silver class!. I like this class so much, I took 3 classes. This is one of the best silver classes I have ever take.Upon arriving I looked thru idea books on what I would like to make. If you and idea and sketch it they will help you make it. The teachers are patient and very skilled. The pieces I made were very nice, I couldn't of done it without all the help from the teachers!I liked it so much I took 3 different classes. I would highly recommend this class
Lovely experience! . This was really fun! We got to try and the staff was so helpful! I'm really pleased with my result! Whould recomend this to everyone I know! :)

A rewarding morning. My wife and me spent the morning with Wayan and his team making a ring and cuff-links. It was really enjoyable converting our designs into the real thing under expert guidance. The team were extremely friendly and patient! We were really pleased with the outcome and would put this as a must to do while spending time in Ubud.

wonderful experience. I booked to do a silver jewellery making class with Wayan and it was wonderful from start to finish. Wayan was very prompt in replying to the initial enquiry and when I arrived he treated me like an old friend. He was very helpful with the choice of design and provided much needed guidance throughout the whole process. He was calm, extremely patient and exceptionally positive as I cut out the design for a pendant. I am very happy with the finished article and each time I wear it, I shall be reminded of the wonderful time I have had in Bali and how genuinely nice the people are. I even got a delicious cup of coffee while making this. It is such good value for money and a lovely way to spend an afternoon!

Jewellery class. I enjoyed doing this class, it was a little hard to find but once there found it to be quite interesting, I would have liked to do a little more myself as the jewellery makers took over quite a bit, but in the end I had a lovely ring to take home at a reasonable price

Making Silver was a platinum experience. . To turn up and be greeted by Wayan with a hug as if we were friends was a great start to wonderful experience. The welcome continued with an offer of drink which in my case was a lemon tea - delish! Coming into the off/wet season this is a great place to watch artisans at work and obtain guidance whilst making a piece you can take home. All while dodging the ever present rain.  Having a pricing structure so that you know roughly what your piece will cost before starting would only enhance experience. Please don't read this review and think I'm whinging about $, this is not the case, I only see this as an improvement on an already great operation.

Great value & very experienced craftsmen.. My partner & I did this class. We left with 2 beautiful pieces of jewellery - a pendant & a ring. I brought along some freshwater pearls & a nostalgic piece of opal that belonged to my mother. We incorporated these into pieces of jewellery that are admired by lots of people back home. Of course the experts did all the clever work, while we had a go at just about everything, but they were there to correct amateurish work & end up with very professional pieces of jewellery. I'll visit this class again happily. Great value as cost includes the workshop as well as the silver. They have books from where you can get ideas on designs if required.
Amazing!. Very happy with my own made ring! It's even better than I had in my mind.The hospitality was also great! Felt very welcome. You should definitely go there when you're on Bali!!

Great Experience!. Such a fun time! We did the 11am class, it was a very hands on course, there were only 2 other people in our group. The owner Wayan is so friendly and passionate about his craft. This was very unique experience that my girlfriend and I will never forget. Worth every penny for the class.

Excellent day out. My wife and I visited Wayan and his team last week as she wished to do a jewellery class. 2 1/2 hours later she came out with a stunning necklace that she had made herself (with a little help from Wayan and his team).I believe there are a few of these classes in the area however she wasn't disappointed with her choice of Chez Monique and the result.They were extremely pleasant people and very helpful. She would recommend anyone interested to go to these people and have a go. You will be surprised how good your work will turn out!

Fantastic experience. Would always highly recommend this! Wayan and the other guys (made the mistake of not getting a name so I can thank them properly) were fantastic. I was worried I'd be hopeless but they made it all so easy and were so friendly and welcoming (Wayan greeted me with a hug and offers of tea/coffee/water/whatever i wanted!).I absolutely love the ring I made, it cost me a little more as it is a bit more silver but definitely still great value for money compared to what you'd pay in a shop, not to mention the experience you get with it and the novelty of it being unique and handmade

Silver class. I went to a silver class this week, it was a great experience! I had never done any silver work. Wayan is very welcoming and the studio was a very relaxed and friendly place to be. There were lots of photos to get ideas from, once I settled on a design for a pendantThey showed me the techniques to cut the silver and build my design.  The silver smiths do the soldering, which I was happy for them to do! I had never used any soldering equipment. There was a student there who obviously had experience and she did her own. My pendant cost me $70 including the lesson but I used quite a bit more silver than some of the others so I expected to pay more. It was the highlight of my trip to Ubud and would love to do it again, plus I have a lovely momento of my time here. Highly recommended.

Great experience . Today I went to the workshop of Chez Monique and made a ring for myself. Such a great 2.5 hours spent making this always with someone ready to guide and assist. Such a relaxing time with my special handmade jewelry item to take home at the end. I'm going back tomorrow.

fantastic experience. I attended Chez Moniquie silver class and had a wonderful time. I was greeted with open arms and was helped with every step of the jewellery making process. It was a highlight of my trip to Ubud

Excellent!. There's a reason why this place is Number One in Ubud for silver making classes - because it's the best! Not perfect (see later) but still the best. There were about half a dozen students making their own jewellery when I attended - and three members of staff!!! Everything you need is provided, including lots of photo samples to choose from if you're not sure what to make. Good tools and equipment, and good tutoring.There is only one thing I would improve. You don't actually get to solder, one of the teachers does that for you. It would be better if you had the chance to solder under supervision.Anyway, apart from that it was a great day! I went to Chez Monique Shop the day before and took a photo of a ring I'd like to copy. The ring was on sale for $40, I made my own which I think was better and the course was only $45!!!Great value,enjoyable day....Thanks!

Fun experience to create a reminder of a great holiday. We travelled to Bali for my 40th and I wanted to make something to remember the experience. Wayan was always smiling and nothing was too much trouble. It was a relaxed fun day in a welcoming environment

The best!. I haven't done this kind of workshop class before and i'm so very happy I did! The hole experience is amazing, supergood teachers that helps you with the parts that can't be made by a first-timer and instructs you on the parts that's easier and so fun to realize you can make on your own and i really felt like an artist! I am. And the result of the finished jewelery was just perfect! Looks like any real piece you could buy for a lot of money back home. This is a must do!

Definitely recommend! . I found out about Chez Monique from a friend and I'm so glad I went. The place is so relaxed you don't feel intimidated if you have no idea what you're doing. The staff are all super lovely and helpful and I am so so happy with my ring. Definitely recommend!

Good fun!. My friend and I each made a ring and it was great fun. Really interesting to watch these guys work and they were all very helpful and friendly. Ends up being a bit expensive but worth it if you have the time/cash.

Fun Creative morning with Friends . The staff here are lovely, knowledgable, and very hospitable. Upon arrival we were offered Balinese style Delicious lemon tea. The hardest part of this process was choosing what you wanted to do you first! I ended up making a rather difficult pendant with many pieces. The staff here are eager to help you make the best possible piece and are willing to help you when you get stuck :-)At the end of the day each of us walked away with a beautiful piece of jewelry that we will either wear or give away as a gift. What a very memorable way to remember our experience here in Ubud. I highly recommend going to this place as they are for twice as much grams of silver and most of the other places even if it's a little bit further away it's still walkable from the center part of Ubud.
Really Something Special. What a fantastic day we had designing and making our own jewellery. Take the time to book a class, you won't be disappointed.

A lot of fun!. Took the jewelry making class in March 2015 with my wife, while on our honeymoon. While I can question the craftsmanship (seeing as how I was the craftsman), I can say that I really enjoyed it, and still get a kick out of the ring I made.Signed up for the class at the Chez Monique store in town; when we took the car up the narrow little streets, farther and farther from town, I have to admit I was becoming a little concerned. But once we got there, we found a cute little enclave of tourists happily working over their pieces of silver, under the smiling supervision of Wayan, the owner. My wife and I had opted to leave our new engagement/wedding rings at home for the honeymoom, jaunting through Southeast Asia, so we both chose to make silver rings in class, as "substitute" wedding rings.Wayan and his assistants were helpful and patient in guiding us through the process. I managed to cut, imprint, sand, and polish my silver ring to my liking. Even though I have my real wedding ring, I like to wear my handmade one, as I chuckle when I think about the making of it.Class is unhurried, and there's no pressure to buy/make more. Definitely memorable.

The BEST way to spend a couple of hours! . My friend and I booked into a class and we enjoyed all of it. Both the owner and his staff gave you the opportunity to do as much or as little as you wanted to, while giving you the space to explore the art of jewellery making. Very reasonably priced. I would highly recommend this to anyone who wants to try something new, or enjoys jewellery.

Wonderful experience! . My friend and I loved this class! The guys that run the class are so lovely and helpful, they guide you through the jewellery making process step by step and make it really easy and enjoyable. We took images of the rings we wanted to make and they recreated them perfectly! A good tip would be to have a think about what you would like to make beforehand! Also just bear in mind the class isn't at the shop it's around a 20 minute away so just double check the location!

Who knew...!. Who knew I could make a silver pendant that I'd not only be proud to wear, but that everyone would be asking me where they could buy one! Chez Monique was a wonderful experience. From coming up with your own design, to actually making a finished piece, you are actively involved in the entire process. The silver smiths are very talented, encouraging, and patient, and they make sure your ideas come to life in the most beautiful ways. Thank you Chez Monique!!

Fantastic silver classer. went there fist time 3 years ago, and HAD to come back,,, 3-4 hours silver class, incl 10 g of silver for just 450000 rp, about 35 us dollars,,the owner Wayan Sunarta and his staff is really helpful, even if you are unexperienced, and he will show his 6 maps of ideas or help if you have your own thoughts and ideas,,ring, bracelet or chain,,,this is one of the things I did in Bali, that I will never forget, and bring home your own homemade silver design is a great pleasure,,,this time I made 2 items, stayed 7 hours, paid 750000 rp,,,A MUST DO In Ubud, Bali,,,met several students, coming back again, who had tried other places, but they all said, that this was the best place to go, and I can only agree,,,

Strengthen the bond with your lover. They say actions speak louder than words, so why not speak the loudest by making your own ring for and with your loved one? Designing your own ring is symbolic. The ring is a powerful symbol of commitment to one another. It may signify other more intimate ideas that only you and your loved one will understand. Guided by certificated master silversmith, they will explain the process to the couple, and supervise along the entire process. A bit complex, but this process will bring the couple closer together in the creation of this sacred and timeless piece. At the end of the day, whether or not the ring that you are making is going to look exactly like in the brochure, it wouldn’t matter. It is not actually the rings but the process of making them that matters.

Great studio atmosphere!. After trying other studios, I was thrilled with the positive, friendly atmosphere. Nothing was too hard and I was able to create an original piece of jewellery with the right amount of help. The teachers care about ensuring you have a quality finished piece in a warm, relaxed environment. Great designs to choose from as well as assistance for your own designs. Thank you from the bottom of my heart!

What a brilliant experience! . I attended the silver making class with two friends and we all loved it. It was such a good experience and completely different to anything I have done on my travels so far. The setting has a really local and authentic feel to it which I really liked. The staff are amazing- so patient, helpful and friendly throughout the entire class. It's lovely to have a beautiful souvenir from the class and I will treasure my ring for a long time. I would highly recommend this class to anyone visiting Ubud!

Fantastic! Give yourself a lot of time!. I came here on an impromptu visit, and I was very pleased with the workshop. It's hands-on, and the people are very friendly. The studio is part of private compound, and I actually appreciated the local feel to this class. Monique herself was also absolutely gorgeous! She doesn't help with the classes, but if you get the chance to meet her, she is vivacious and fun-loving! I joked around with her a fair bit! My only recommendation is to give yourself plenty of time, so you can get better value from the class by producing a more complex piece of jewellery. The ring I made will be treasured for a long time!

Something different . This morning I had silver smith workshop. I really enjoyed it and with the help of the people around, it was very easy! Before I went there, I searched some pictures of rings I like and it was no problem to make one of them. Loved the workshop, loved the people and love the ring!

Fantastic!. One of the best experiences one can have in Ubud - from the outset, Pak Wayan Sunarta and his staff are hugely welcoming, friendly and professional. You are only limited here by the scope of your imagination, and the team will help design and create whatever you can imagine. Definitely worth the trip - we'll be coming back!

Make your jewelry here. There are several options for jewelry making in Ubud the Chez Monique is the best. Staff is very helpful, allows you to do what you can and takes care of the trick stuff, mostly the soldering. I make a silver ring from a stone bought at nearby Batu Batu and it turned out great. Can't say enough about this place. Set aside 3 hours or so and you'll probably come back again.

Really great. I loved doing this silver making class. It was a fun way to spend a few hours and I will definitely return next time I go to Ubud. Wayan was out collecting a group, but I was so well looked after and had one on one attention from the staff at Chez Monique. For half the time, I was the only one there, and it was so great to have such a focused experience. I loved this class. Do it!

Fun way to spend a couple of hours. Under Wayan's cheery and expert guidance you can make your own silver jewelry. My wife and I made each other's wedding rings and this year came back to make an anniversary gift. You will be amazed at how good it looks--and it comes with a great story. There are a lot of classes in Ubud but this is the best!

An Awesome Bali Memory. Don't need to write a big long review as we'll leave it to our fellow TA reviewers who left all the fabulous vibes for Chez Monique. Our photo says it all of a morning of moments that has become a memory for all for of us which will always bring a smile.NOTE .... The classes are not at the shop they are run at a private residence which is not far form the Ubud Art Markets.

A great fun way to fill a morning. Was staying close and decided to try make my own ring. Once there I drew up three ring designed and decided on one with the input of the staff. The staff was very helpful was very willing to correct my mistakes. The ring looks amazing. Took about 2 hours and the ring ended up costing $38 US

Amazing, tons of fun. My wife and I loved it. You are greeted with a hug, and then get to draw out your design. The staff is super helpful and will assist you with making even the most ambitious of projects.Highly recommend and will be back again.

Awesome silversmith class at Chez Monique! . A 3-hour class really well spent learning the trick of making brilliant silver jewelry! My daughter & I loved every moment of it. Pak Wayan & his team are super nice, patient & really guides every single step of the process. Makes you truly appreciate the complexity & skill in making silver jewelry! Would definitely come back!

An experience to remember, an unique to bring home to. I went there with my partner and had an awesome experience. We got lucky as we were the only students at the beginning (3 more showed up after 1 hour but it's fine) so we had a lot of attention and guidance from the owner, Wayan. Such a kind and friendly person. We designed our pieces and made 50%of it until they had to go through soldering and polishing, believing to be the difficult part. We are both incredibly happy with the end results and felt so fulfilled. Accepting card payment so was convenient for us. Some suggestions for improvement will be to control the size of the class to 5-6 so each student gets to learn properly, and involve more on the 2 nd part of the process too (would be nice to at least offer of student wishes to do the finishing our explain why they can't).All and all, a must try activity and keep up the good work Wayan and team!

Best experience in Ubud Bali. Today I took a Chez Monique Silver Smith class with my family. If you are looking for a great way to spend a few hours, where all the family can enjoy the hands on experience of making their very own creation, this is the perfect place. Wayan and his team, with their patience and guidance, help you create your masterpiece. You can easily while away a morning in the relaxed atmosphere of a traditional Balinese compound. I would highly recommend this activity when in Ubud. Very unique experience and great keepsake.Thank you Wayan for a fantastic day.

Great activity. The staff is really helpfull and friendly. The also give honest advice regarding to what you can make and what you can't. We are very pleased with the results and enjoyed the activity very much. For the bracelet (only partly silver) we payed 500k, for the ring 450k. Nice memory!

DIY jewelry in Ubud, Bali. My partner and I were looking for something that we can share as a couple and bring back something memorable from our trip to Bali. We came across this lovely little place in Ubud which allows you to personally handcraft your own silver ring. They do others likes ear rings, pendants and necklace but we wanted something personal. We DIY our own design of a heart shaped ring and the owner was more than accommodating to help us design exactly to our specification. It was not only the end result that amazed us but the entire process of making a ring from a single silver strip which doesn't look like much at first. The owner and the staff guided us through the entire process and made us the most cherished ring we wear every day. Thank you so much for giving us something so special to cherish for each other!!!

Make a permanent souvenir. What a great way to spend a few hours and let your creative side shine. You are taught very gently how to make a ring, bracelet, pendant or whatever your heart desires. The best activity we did as a family. Everyone who was there had great success.

Fantastic for the creative at heart :). We had such a wonderful time. It's a perfect activity for the rainy afternoon. The guys who run it are fantastic and help you every step of the way.
I highly recommend to anyone looking for a genuine experience..

A great place to make silver jewellery. A really well set-up studio within a traditional family compound, with lots of space, all materials and equipment and expert tuition/guidance. A good balance of one-on-one instruction and leaving you to do your own thing (depending on your level of experience). Wayan is very kind and gentle and genuinely seems to care about giving his customers a good experience. I've done other workshops in Bali and this is definitely the best.

Fun Experience!. Great way to spend a rainy afternoon. Friendly staff who show you how to operate the equipment, which isn't too hard to learn. I made a rather simple looped ring but you can be as ambitious as you'd like.Tip: Bring your own gems and stones if you'd like to incorporate them in your design. They do not sell any. Also bring your own chains if you'd like to create intricate necklaces.

WONDERFUL MORNING. My daughter and I spent a wonderful morning at Chez Monique Silver workshop. Wayan and his staff are so helpful and patient. It was a lovely experience being at Wayans home with little chickens running around and Wayan's family going about their daily life. My daughter loved it and rated it the best experience that she had in Ubud. Thank you. Highly recommended

Amazing the kids said. We booked this as an activity for 2 boys and they absolutely loved it. The gentleman who runs this is exceptionally kind and runs this is exceptionally kind and generous. It was a unique opportunity for them to try design something in silver-and the result was brilliant too

great fun . we had an excellent time with Wayan & fellow workers. I love my ring & the kids havent taken off their pieces. A great educational experience to understand the processes in creating a piece of jewellery. Beautiful location, prices are reasonable, overall brilliant.
Great experience! . Loved this! great experience was good to come with my own idea to save time as my husband, 3year old and 8 month old sat patiently and watched too & they were welcomed too.

A highlight. Had an amazing time with myself and my partner attending the stone carving and silver workshop.The teachers are really kind and patient, it's a very relaxing peaceful experience. Would recommend to everyone interested.

One of our best memories in Bali!. We had a great time making a ring and necklace. Wayan is very helpful and makes it fun even if you have no idea what you are doing. As others have said, having a design in mind beforehand is helpful. Wayan has a book with lots of ideas to inspire you.

Amazing experience - a must!. If you have always wanted to make your own ideas come to life this is the workshop for you.I would recommend getting inspiration and research from the internet or your own drawings before you arrive so you have lots of time to play while you are there.The staff are really friendly and very helpful.Wayan is a great guy.Highly recommended for a creative day out.It will become a special keepsake forever.I know I will be wearing mine a lot.:)

An awesome experience!. This was my first time doing silver smithing so I needed a lot of help.. Luckily the staff at Chez Monique was very helpful and available! They made the process smooth by doing some of the steps for me while I was working on some other part. In the end I had a great pair of cufflinks without having any prior experience :)

Great experience!. I heard this silver smith class is the best so my expectations were high when we finally arrived.It's a very welcoming atmosphere and the people working there are very friendly and helpful. I can definitely recommend you to stop by at the silver smith class if you're in Ubud (or maybe that's a reason to actually go to Ubud?) You don't need any knowledge about smithing (like I said - they help you with everything you need!) and I'm sure you'll have a great time even if you're already good at it :)

wonderful day. We had a lot of fun and a really great time here. Our rings are beautiful and we learnt how to make them. The staff is really friendly. Moreover a chilled and relaxing atmosphere. Great ;)

What a fabulous experience!. I just spent 3 days studying a technique with the staff here that I have wanted to learn. I am an experienced Metalsmith but Wayan Sunarta & his staff were as wonderful with me as they were with all the beginners I observed over my time in the studio- he was unfailingly professional & warm, his assistants were great as well- everyone seemed to walk away pleased and happy, & carrying home a unique memento of their time in Ubud. I am so pleased to have had this opportunity! Thank you Wayan!

Fun. Put in as much or as little effort as you like.. Chez Monique was a great experience making silverware. If unsure or uninspired the staff have at least 5 binders full of great inspiration for jewelry ideas. They assist you to make your piece. You can also do as much or as little work as you desire. So you can be there for between 1 and 3 hours depending. It was fun and interesting. The only let down was the lack of formal greeting so I was unsure if I was in the right place. They also gave you very little assistance unless requested. The staff didn't monitor your progress, they did their own work and helped when asked. Which is good if you're outgoing, but if you're shy it might be a draw back. Overall it was fun and interesting and I would do it again.

High expectations & not disappointed! A++++. As a lover of silver jewellery I was looking for a class which wd allow me to make a large ring - after exploring a few silver workshops in Ubud I decided this one might allow me to tackle a rather chunky ring. At first the assistant seemed dubious when I suggested my design but I persevered and agreed to pay more if I used more than the 10mg silver (most other classes offer 5mg for 350,000 whereas this was 10mg for 450,000). They also let me know that the design wd take more than three hours. I firstly flattened my silver plate then stamped letters into the band before spending nearly four hours sawing, sanding and polishing. I didn't solder but suspect I cd have had a go if I asked as I saw another guest soldering. The assistants who helped me were friendly and very patient, happy to reposition a copper bead when I asked! Wayan, the master silversmith was also on hand to give advice and chat to. He even made us a lovely coffee :) My large chunky ring weighed in at 600,000 which I think was a bargain considering the amount of detailed work that went into it - esp on the soldering and filing front. I learnt so much from the workshop and think it's a bargain when all is considered. Many thanks to everyone at Chez Monique - I'll def be encouraging fellow friends and travellers to visit.

Fun thing to do. Been to Bali many many times and people often ask me why. It is such a beautiful place to go and always has new and fun things to do. This trip we joined Wayan at his Chez Monique "studio" where we made our own silver ornament to bring home. Mine was a pendant. It took 1/2 a day for the activity and there is heaps of help (as much as you need) and the boys can even "fix" for you, hahaha. Would definitely recommend for singles, couples, young or old. Everyone can enjoy this activity. Thanks Wayan.

Fantastic activity. These guys are hands down experts in their craft and so very kind and welcoming. The shop classes are held in their family compound. When I arrived I got a warm welcome and was offered design ideas for a piece or to do my own. The owner was superbly helpful to make my idea come to life. They even expertly backtracked one of my pieces to fix the lettering so that it looked perfect. It was a very rewarding activity and wonderful way to take home a custom gift. Don't miss this, it's a must!

Great stuff. I took my now new wife to Chez Monique to create a special bracelet for her wedding gift. She was also able to craft my wedding ring. The advice and quality that came from Wayan and his crew was second to none. To have a great experience in Ubud this is definitely a go to option. Can't say a bad word.

such a fun activity!. Really great and friendly people and a fun time creating my own masterpiece! The guys at Chez Monique walk you through sample designs, provide tea/water and help you through the process of making a small piece of jewelry. Great way to spend a morning in Ubud!

Addictive silversmithing. I've been to this cute little place twice and I'm going back in less than a month. The staff is very helpful, the owner Wayan is super friendly and the result is always really, really good. Make sure you get the see the whole process even though you're not doing everything yourself, it's very interesting and cool.Both my boyfriend, my dad and my sister loved it. Well worth a visit. Or two. Or three.I think they liked my boyfriend's design because now you can find it at the Chez Monique shop. That's kinda cool.

I'm happy to experience the work of commemoration silver beautiful place
. I'm happy to experience the work of memento of silver and I was with my wife and I enjoyed the experience and can

Amazing - try it yourself!. I've been amateurishly making jewellery myself for the past few years, having learnt in Thailand, but Wayan was kind enough to not only let me use his studio space to do some work, but also to help me get things right.He and his team are all expert silversmiths, and incredibly helpful and kind.Whether you have experience of not (I presume most don't) then they are there to help you create beautiful pieces of silver jewellery to take away with you.I would highly recommend taking a trip to Wayan's and learn how to make something special.

Great family event. 3 adults and 5 kids all had a lovely time. Very hands on and casual afternoon. We all came home with our own designs (albeit with help from the experts) plus some upgraded options. Everyone enjoyed and really good value.

LOVE LOVE LOVE. This was a morning well spent in Ubud. We decided to do the course last minute and they where very accommodating. Very patient, helpful and encouraging! I love the ring I made and have had so many compliments! Water is plentiful. Great experience in Ubud. My boyfriend wasn't convinced the course would be fun however he loved it! Great for everyone.

Just sorry I didn't find this class years ago. This was a great experience. I could easily have gone back again the next day to make something else. It was so rewarding to be able to make something yourself. The staff were great and the setting (the Owner's family compound) really added to the experience. I will definitely do this class again next time I am in Bali.

Great fun, learnt to make my own silver jewellery - perfect souvenir. Highly recommended!!!! This was a great experience, and gave us all an appreciation of what effort and skill goes into hand made silver jewellery. We were travelling in a group of 6 and we all decided to make something different, pendants, brooches and rings. We were taught about the process and set about designing our pieces. Wayan and his team guided us and helped us through each step but still allowed us to make our own pieces. It was estimated that we would be there about 2 hours and some of group chose quite complex designs so they took longer. There was no time pressure to finish, it was all about achieving our special silver pieces of jewellery.The staff were patient and helpful, I would recommend anyone going to Ubud try it.Check the address, we went to the shop but the workshops are in a different location a good 15 minutes walk from there

Handmade engagement rings. My fiancé and I went to Chez Monique today for my 30th birthday where we made our engagement rings. We both really enjoyed the workshop - Wayan was the perfect teacher, he would explain how to do something, show us how to practice and then we would work on the jewellery. He was also good at helping us when we were less than master jewellers! We are both over the moon about what we made - and that's a big statement because we're planning to wear them everyday for the rest of our lives! :)

Very good workshop. I have a wonderful workshop and I made set of earrings. The staff were very friendly and give a lot of explanation. I even did a lot of solder ( working with fire and silver) great experience!!

Created the best Bali souvenir myself. I was looking for some creativity and found this awesome silver class on TA. After contacting Wayan via email, he rapidly confirmed the class I would like to attend. The location was great, it was in the outer space of Wayans family residence. There were many examples to choose from if you don't have anything in mind yet. I designed a feather pendant and created almost everything myself! Wow, didn't expect I could do this. Many thanks to Wayan and team, I would definitely recommend!

Great experience, highly recommend. What an amazing experience, we both finished pieces of jewellery we love, such a satisfying experience. Wayan is a great teacher leading you into new challenges. We had so much fun with Wayan and the other class members. 13 year old daughter loved the clas

Expect lots of fun . I strongly recommend this very unique experience to anyone who comes to Ubud. Never ever thought I could make my own jewellery but I managed to do so with assistance from wonderful silversmiths. Indeed I had so much fun. Nice and memorable experience. Trimakashi Wayan Sunarta!

Fun new experience. I took my 13 yr old son to Sunartas class. We arrived early & were the only 2 for a little while, which was excellent as we had his undivided attention. My son drew his own design from scratch, I perused the albums for some inspiration & away we went. I sat for a while watching the men make some pieces for orders, they were charming and happy for me to take photos.Would highly reccomend & would love to return.
Great experience!!!. What an awesome place to do something unique in great location. Many thanks Wayan. We all made original pieces that will be memorable souvenirs

So good, we went twice!. We absolutely loved Wayan's classes at Chez Monique. Wayan is so warm and friendly and his staff are very patient. We were offered cold water and a hug when we arrived. The whole atmosphere is relaxed and supportive, ask as many questions as you like to learn as you go. The first time we made plain silver rings from designs in books Wayan provided. The second time we visited a shop called Batu Batu for some semi-precious stones, and made silver rings with stones set in them based on our own designs. Both my fiancé and I just really enjoyed the whole process of being involved in choosing a design, working with our hands and seeing the gorgeous jewellery come to life. I have attempted some basic silversmithing at home and now have a much better understanding and improved skills. I even learnt a special Bali technique of placing individual silver balls along my ring which looks amazing. We love our unique Bali souvenirs and the memories that go with them!

So helpful. What an incredible experience. I am horrible at working with my hands but my boyfriend loves this kind of thing, so I booked the class after reading reviews.As expected I was terrible at the actual crafting howv however Wayan and his amazing team were so patient and kind and handled my incompetence very well!! :) They are so skilled at fixing mistakes, suggesting improvements and providing guidance that I never once felt embarrassed.For those more adept at this kind of activity, like my boyfriend, the team are great at explaining techniques and methods to get the desired results.

Amazing experience. My husband and I went to Chez Monique in August and we absolutely loved it. If you are looking for a unique souvenir from your visit to Ubud, that's the place to go. We made our own silver pendants and that's probably the best thing we brought back from Bali. Wayan and his team are very helpful, very patient and fun! Thank you so much for the great time, hope to see you again when we are back in Ubud.

Loved This Experiance. Wayan and his wonderful group of individuals always make this experience so special. It is a very relaxed atmosphere where tea and water is served to you right away. There are pieces of paper and books for you to design the pieces that you want. They help you shape, cut, weld and shine your pieces. Once you are done the pieces look like they came from the shop. I have witnessed people from all ages having a go with it and loving their creations.This is my third time doing this and I plan to go back again. Well worth an afternoon of creativity.

Loved the silver smith class! I want to go again!. I had a wonderful time making a special ring at the silver smith class. I arrived :15 minutes early, walked down into the back of the property past a man painting and chanting and was greeted with great warmth by Wayan Sunarta. There were about 5 others from the earlier class and yet I felt very taken care of. I was offered a cold bottle of water and shown design books for inspiration. I was able to choose and design a ring I wanted in silver. I formed letters for a word to put on the ring and hand cut small hearts to put on the sides. I made a mistake with punching the letters on the back and they made my error disappear. I was able to watch them solder the pieces together and was taught how to smooth, buff and shine the ring. I was amazed that I could cut tiny 1/6 inch hearts out of silver with a handsaw. I paid about $35 US for the 3 hour class and also tipped 2 of the workers for their patient help. I would recommend this without hesitation. One point of note is that I chose to walk to the studio about 1.5 miles from my homestay. The addres of the class location is #57 an you might think it close to the corner but it is more like 5-6 blocks up the street.
Fantastic. Such a great experience making our own jewellery is a must to do in Ubud. We made matching rings. Relaxing class and so very friendly and helpful.
Awesome . Very helpful and informative.. nice and friendly people who make you at home. Well worth the visit. You can pick your own design and produce it. A nice experience
Fun Experience. This is a nice experience in Ubud if you are looking for something a little different. Every piece of jewelry that my group made was beautiful. Only takes about two hours.

Wonderful experience -highly recommended . We attended with our 2 children and had a fantastic morning. Everyone was friendly and more than willing to share their knowledge and know-how with us. We will definitely be returning on our next trip.

Great fun. And enjoyable way to spend a morning or Fternoon, very helpful staff, and you get to make whatever you want, we will definitely come again to make something a little more complicated next time... Loved it...
Amazing experience. Had am excellent experience here today. Made a beautiful silver ring and the guys wee so helpful. It turned out amazingly and I'd defo recommend this for your trip to ubud

Awsome experience . My partner took part in one of their jewellery making courses while on our trip to Ubud and she loved it. She was allowed to design a piece of her own and Wayan and his staff helped her to create it. It was the highlight of the whole trip for her. Would highly recommend for anyone with an interest in jewellery making.

Great way to bring home something special from Bali. You could go to a shop or market and buy some jewellery but this is so much more fun and rewarding. Don't leave this to the last day you are in Ubud (as we did) because you might just want to go back again (as I did!)Wayan and his helpers run a relaxed silver smith class in Wayan's family compound. We felt at home as soon as we entered and were greeted by his wife, Monique! Firstly you choose and draw a design, we copied ours from the books of examples. Then you are assisted in all the elements of bringing that pencil drawing into reality.The helpers are very patient and one of them did such a great job with my 8 year old. They explained all the steps well and even were able to correct any mistakes you might have made. My daughters loved helping to operate the soldering iron by pumping the bellows. It is not a rushed atmosphere but stay as long as you like and take your time.Wayan happily shared his business story and showed us the types of jewellery he exports all around the world.His home is away from the main streets of Ubud so quiet and tranquil. There is a map on his store door in town to show you the way.So make sure you do this when in Ubud, I certainly will be back.

Terrific Experience. My wife and I attended for a class and left with custom jewelry that looks like we could have purchased at the store. Wayun walked us through each step, with a smile on his face. It was a very enjoyable experience I would strongly recommend.

Amazing class, awesome jewellery and lovely people!!!. My friend and I went to a class at 2:30, we decided to make a pendent and ring. We had a lovely time and the people were great! Make sure you leave enough time to make exactly what you want :D its a great price and definitely worth it as you get to take your personalised item home !!

Fantastic Experience!. On the recommendations of Trip Advisor reviews, five of my friends and myself, made the trip up to Ubud to partake in this experience, and I have to say it was well worth it, we all thoroughly enjoyed ourselves.From the moment you walk through the gates, and beautiful gardens, you are made to feel so very welcome. On arrival you are given books with ideas, if you havent already decided on what you would like to make. No matter what your ability the staff are there to assist you and make suggestions, teaching you to use the tools etc.We had a wonderful day and we all came away totally in love with what we made. Cannot recommend this activity highly enough, the staff and family are so welcoming and friendly, and you come home with your own cleverly designed and beautiful masterpiece to take home as a memory.

The best kind of souvenir!. I have always been interested in handmade jewellery, and I was finally able to have the chance to create my own piece! I made stackable rings, and my partner made earrings. The staff were very friendly and extremely helpful. If you have an idea in mind of what you want to create, they will do their absolute best to make it come to life. Thanks!
Wwonderful afternoon. Wonderful afternoon making silver jewelry. Very helpful and many designs to choose from. Highly recommend this. ++ one on one help. Reasonably priced

Perfect souvenir to bring home!. My boyfriend and I made a pair of silver couple rings there and that becomes our most memorable gift from Bali! The staffs were friendly and patient. We discussed for almost 40 minutes to came out with our design. The staff gave his suggestion and guide to us to make sure our design is doable. After that, they taught us step by step by demonstrating themselves. They were also walking around to help when we meet problems. We spent only 2 hours to make 2 rings. It was definitely a great experience to us!  Cost was agreed as Rp 900,000 for two while booking. However, based on the design of work, we had to topped up additional Rp 100,000. Anyway, I think it was still a reasonable price for 926 grade silver rings.

Second Time a Treat. Visited here with my sister, I had been before and she was impressed with my ring I made the first time. Patient craftsmen who guide you through the process. If mistakes are made, they are expertly corrected. Love our unique works of art.

Must Do!. This was soooooo cool! One of a kind souvenior that you take home, you can't get anywhere else. The first step is that you choose a template of theirs or sketch your own and decide what type of jewelry you want to make. Next, they tape the sketch onto a piece of metal and then you hit that piece of metal with a hammer to make the design. Next you have to use a thin wire cutter thing to cut out the design. This was sooo difficult. We kept breaking ours and felt very bad. Next you buff the sides until it is smooth. Then they take it and burn the final pieces onto the jewelry to make them wearable. I really really enjoyed this and it was one of our highlights of Ubud. They are extremely helpful if you have any problems with any of the steps.

Amazing experience. Wow, loved doing my boyfriend present which he loved. Enter through the the room and I was received with a warm welcome,staff is very patient and very helpful at all times. The quality of pieces are really impressive. I have done exactly what I had in mind.highly recommend..

Amazing experience. This was such a highlight of my time in Ubud that I went twice, and stayed for about 5 hours each time. I brought my own stones and did a quick sketch of my idea, and they said go ahead. I did the vast majority of work myself. They did the soldering and a bit of help on the tricky bits. They are so helpful and there was 4 jewellers to help the students. So happy with my final products! Cost was 500,000 for the feather and 550,000 for the platypus, but like I said I was there for the majority of the day! Couldn't be happier :)

Should be on top of your 'To-Dos' in Ubud. We visited Chez Monique Silver Smith Class during our Honeymoon in Bali and it happened to be one of our best experiences. Mr. Wayan Sumatra, an expert Silver Smith himself, runs this and he couldn't more hospitable to accommodate guests to his classes. This is not your run of the mill workshop / class or a standard tourist trap where everyone just flock to get some pictures. This is a place where you can actually get to know how a jewellery is made right from the design on a piece of paper until the finishing stages. Typically takes about 3- 4 hours of your time and you will be either asked to select one of the many designs already in the book or if you have any of your own creative ideas, you can draw them on a piece of paper and they will help you materialize it in the form of a jewelry. While my wife decided to go with a standard design off the book, i surprised her by making her a minion pendant (she's a big fan). Right from booking over the phone and during the class, Wayan & his staff were very helpful and attentive enough to help create our jewelry. We both enjoyed the whole process and we would highly recommend it to anyone visiting Ubud.

Awesome!!. I visit in June this year. Wayan was so helpful and patient considering I had never done this before. Heaps of pictures to give you ideas of what to make. I made a ring and stamped my families initials on the inside. Love it! I went with my sister who had been before as she was impressed on her last visit. Definitely make the time to visit Chez Monique

fabulous experience. I made a beautiful ring with help from the teachers .I had a stone that I brought with me and a picture of a ring from etsy and away we went ...Lovely atmosphere ,everyone was happy with their outcome ,and I look at it every day and remember bali ...

Magical!. My girlfriend and I visited the studio on the last morning of our trip. We had read glowing reviews of Chez Monique Studios and Wayan, and they deserve every one of them.We had a fantastic experience making some silver rings and the staff were so helpful and patient with us novices!They have a brilliant range of designs you can choose from or will help you create something you've designed yourself.One of the highlights of the experience was the fact that the studio is part of the family complex which made the morning very special indeed.We could not recommend this enough!

Best experience of our whole holiday. This was great we saw all of the fantastic reviews on trip advisor before we went, so we decided it was one of the must do things of our holiday and it was even better than expected. we emailed while we there and they helped organise a pick up from our hotel which even gave us some time to have lunch and look around ubud as well. My girlfriend lorraine made a pendant for her sister and i made lorraine a ring. we had to look through the hundreds of pictures for inspiration but once we had done that we were basically left to make our own designs and with and with a little bit of a suggestion from the experts our designs turned out great and we really enjoyed the whole experience and the things even looked good at they end which i was not expecting from me especially as i am not the most artistic type.i really recommend had a brilliant time.

Fantastic. Thank you Wayan & team! We had a awesome time creating our own pieces of jewelry. Fascinating to be involved in it from drawing to cutting to filing to engraving to oxidizing to polishing. Start to finish, with great help from the team of course!

Best in ubud. I designed my own ring and it was amazing! The people are so helpful and suck kind hearted! I would do this again if I had more time in bali, my ring was 55 rp and it took me 2 hours to make. I couldn't be more thankful to have this experience! Thank you

A unique expérience you get to keep forever.. Create a silver piece of jewellery, a simple pendant or set your own jewel in silver bezel. A peaceful outdoor setting, well equiped with enough work tables and tools for several people. A nice way to spend two hours or so. I brought a piece of Lapis Lazuli, the very helpful and skilled staff taught me how to set it in a bezel. It is a gorgeous pendant I will have forever to remember my time in Bali. I would come back again and again.

Brilliant, a totally unexpected experience. My husband and I went - we arrived slightly early, which was good as we had a bit more time to look at designs. My husband is normally not an arts and crafts type of guy but I think he had a better time than me!There is Wayan who is a star, and several other silversmiths who help out, everyone had plenty of attention.I was astonished that I could actually work silver (with a good amount of help!) and have a pair of earrings I am very happy to wear. A couple of other people had brought pre-drawn designs which looked absolutely stunning made up into reality.If you're in Ubud I can wholeheartedly recommend this class, it is deservedly popular.

One of the highlights of my travels. It was a real pleasure to work in this amazing studio. EVERYONE was very helpful. I made a bracelet that was of my own design and the staff and craftsmen were very helpful in helping, especially as I broke a couple of blades while cutting the silver. This isn't a 'class' where you come in and make the same thing at the same time, but instead work on your piece at your own pace. I stayed most of the day, but some were out in a couple of hours or less. They have a lot of images to choose from....rings, necklaces/pendants, bracelets....or you can come up with your own design or bring a photo of what you want. Next time I'm in Ubud, I will definitely come back. Wayan and his group are fantastic, as are the other people who take part. I met some really lovely people as well.
Great activity and staff. The whole staff was very helpful and the results of our creations were above our expectations. Great couple or family activity and definitely unique. Highly recommended !

One of the best.... It was one of the best thing we've done. We made couple rings and Wayan was extremely accomodating in the process. Nothing better than making souvenirs ourselves. This will be one of the thing we will remember for years to come.

Fantastic. My entire family had the most memorable time - my 11 and 13 year old spent at least 15 hours there over 3 days !!! You can create anything you want and the welcoming, patient, experienced staff will guide you and help through every step as needed- this is an experience not to be missed
Fun for all. you can make it as easy or as hard. they will give you as much help or as little help as you want. they are very nice and helpful. even bought my gf a coke. anything to make you happy

Wonderful unique experience. We booked in with Wayan for some silver smithing before we left the UK to get married in Bali... we were SO pleased we did. My other half and I made each other wedding rings at Chez Monique the week before our wedding and were utterly delighted with the result. The staff were great and so helpful and relaxed. It was a wonderfully chilled and memorable experience for us both. Neither of us had done anything like it before and we just loved it!

One of my favorite memories... . This was hands down one of our top experiences in Ubud! My friend Jack and I found this via Tripadvisor and couldn't be happier about our decision to go, especially during such a crazy busy touristy time to visit! Note: Be sure to go to the studio location and not the shop address! However, they're fortunately not far from each other and you can even go to the shop to pay with a visa after! When we arrived we walked into a place of wonderfully positive energy with smiling faces, 3-4 other people hard at work on their silver creations, and colored little chicks running around! Wayan was INCREDIBLE and so encouraging of you doing as much of the work as possible--including drawing your piece yourself! I'm crafty but have never done anything like this and am far from a drawing artist. The employees were so lovely and encouraging! During our 2.5 hours there we were served water and coffee and Wayan set my sit for lengthy periods of time! Everyone always checks in on your work, and you know that you'll never leave with something mediocre-looking! It is a true testament to the company that every patron in the open air studio with us had been there previously! I would've been a "repeat creator" as well if I had more time! Wayan even helped me create another necklace out of the recycled silver from my original pendant! This place is a true gem and I sent everyone I met on my Bali travels to make their own unique, everlasting memory in Ubud here! Four friends that I know of attended the studio thus far and had the same glowing reviews! A quote from Wayan as he was connecting two of my silver pieces together: I love my job. I make new friends like you every day. That warms my heart and says it all.

Come away with something truly unique.... Really pleasant experience; completely different to what I had been doing in Bali prior - a welcomed change of pace.Very talented people helped me make a pendant for my girlfriend from real silver. The environment was a lovely Balinese residence - calm and peaceful. It was fun to design and make (with expert aid) something that meant a lot.Thanks to everyone there!

Amazing . What a fantastic experience. We were greeted with a lovely hug from Wayan. After choosing our design we were helped to choose our silver and ring size etc. The staff are very helpful, patient and skilled. An amazing souvenir to bring back from a beautiful place. A visit to Ubud wouldn't be complete without a visit here. I loved my ring so much I'm going back tomorrow to make a bangle. Thank you Wayan and family

Best Experience!! . Absolutely loved making my own jewellery! Wayane was lovely and very helpful. I was greeted with a big hug! Wayane was very patient with me and I loved the intimate setting of the class (I was the only one there). Wayane showed me his beautiful orders that are sent to overseas customers! I will definitely be back here next time I come to Bali!!!!

Chez Monique Silver Class. My sisters and mum booked into a class and it was wonderful. Great location, staff were fantastic, fixed all my mistakes and I left with a piece of jewellery that I love. Really great thing to do in Bali.

Lovely way to spend a morning. I wanted to book this class a few weeks before hand however due to a ceremony it was a public holiday but luckily on my return visit to Ubud they were open! Me and 3 friends went along in the morning with a vague idea of what we wanted to make. We had had a look on Pinterest the night before and saved some photos of some ring designs we liked (I would recommend this however there is a book with designs for you to choose from if you aren't feeling as creative). After deciding what we were going to make Wayan came over and introduced himself to us and the silversmiths. The were incredibly patient and even when I said I got stuck on occasion and asked for help they always showed me the correct way and then handed the item back to me rather than taking over. They do the soldering but everything else is down to you even the polishing at the end!I would highly recommend this class even if you aren't a particularly arty type it doesn't matter they will help you until you have a finished product and lasting memory of Ubud! Please note the location was a little tricky to find, on google maps the Kecak fire and dance temple is on the same street, you need to keep waking up this street for around 10 mins as the silversmith workshop is near the top of the road, this wasn't made clear when were handed the business card with the location in the shop.

Making silver jewellery. A great attraction for young and older adults.Go with some ideas of the silver jewellery you would like to make and these professional silver smiths will help you achieve your dream.Take semi precious stones to add to your piece ,availableE in Ubud.Booking is a good idea and allow plenty of time.
Amazing!. An incredible experience. Totally worth it. Will go back again when I'm back. People were so nice and helpful. Thank you Wayan, for such a great time.

Amazing experience creating my own silver jewelry!. This class is unbelievable. The people who operate the class are so helpful, kind, and PATIENT. They are very instructive and they allow you to do your own thing, but under careful guidance so you never quite feel like you're left to do this alone. The experience itself was one of a kind, and weather you are a beginner in the silversmith world (as I was) or a jewelry maker (as another fellow-classmate was), it is easy to make the jewelry as simple or as complicated as you'd like it to be. So much freedom and self-expression. I would definitely recommend it to anyone visiting Ubud, whether you are with others or traveling alone - you meet plenty of people there too. Not only a great memento from your trip for you, but can also make an excellent gift for someone you left at home :)

Do-it-yourself souvenirs. If you fancy a learning experience that results in a one of a kind souvenir, this is definitely worth doing. We designed our own pieces and I was surprised by how much of the work we were allowed to do ourselves (although reading other reviews, other people seem to have had quite different experiences in this regard, so not sure how variable this is). Staff were really friendly and helpful, and good at suggesting improvements to our design. Also very kind when it came to my dreadful craftsmanship. "You can tell it's handmade." You certainly can. Points to note: The workshop is not at the same place as the chez monique shop. It is about ten minutes walk from the palace. Easy to find though. It's really worth thinking about what you are going to make before you go. Have some designs in mind, do some sketches to take along and I think you'll get more from the experience.

A happy memory. I had a very pleasant time in there. The instructor and the rest of the staff are very patient and helpful.The class takes place in their house which is nice. And creating your own piece is challenging yet exciting and rewarding.If you're in Ubud then I'd say pay them a visit.

Unique and so much fun!!. Attended a class today and will be coming back next time I'm in Bali! Looked at pictures and then came up with my own design. Wayan and two other silver smiths were there with directions and support whenever it was needed! 90% of the work I was able to complete, with a little bit of help with the soldering. So happy with the end product! :D

Memorable experience and best souvenirs. Very friendly and helpful owner and staff, we enjoyed the experience very much! It's amazing to learn how to build a piece of jewelry from scratch, watch how a string of silver turns into a designer quality piece of art. One of the best memories from our Bali trip.

Amazing!. This was by far the highlight of my trip to Bali. Wayan is so lovely and patient and nothing was too much trouble. He brought out ice cold bottles of water which was a welcome relief in the hot Bali weather. I made a beautiful pendant, something that I will wear for years to come!! Thankyou Wayan and friends, I will be back next time I visit Ubud!!

Favorite thing I did in Ubud by far!!. I ABSOLUTELY LOVED this class. I even went back twice to make two necklaces. Everybody there was so sweet and nice and so kind. Really amazing experience. Me and my family had a wonderful time at the workshop and had a great time. I was incredibly pleased with my final product and will be wearing them everyday! Loved it! They have these wonderful books full of beautiful ideas for the jewelry you can make. But also, you can make whatever you want! They can help you with it and every single product that comes out of the workshop looks like a professional did it, when it, in fact, came from your own hands. We all loved the workshop so much that we went twice in the same week! At the end of my vacation, I ended up with two beautiful necklaces, one was Yin and Yang and the other necklace of Buddha, both perfectly representing me and what I love and cherish. It was magical! I loved this so much. Plus, if you mess up (like I did a couple of times....) they can fix it and make it beautiful, looking like there was never a mistake.The people there are SO nice. It was a wonderful experience. I would definitely recommend this to anyone.So, if you guys happen to be Bali, Ubud, then you should DEFINITELY go to this workshop. Incredible. I loved it so much. Great memories there.Will definitely be back there again!Love it so much! <3 <3

Favorite souvenir from Ubud :). Learned A LOT from this experience :) Spent 2-3 hours making a pendant that I absolutely loved!
