Wayan and the rest of the staff are really friendly, Wayan instantly greeted me and my partner with a hug. It's true that everybody there was like a family, very helpful and ready to assist everyone doing the workshop. Even if you're not artistically inclined, they will certainly help you produce a personalized and professional looking piece of jewellery, it's amazing!!!! Also if you make a mistake not to worry because they can magically fix it for you :) Also Wayan's white coffee was SO GOOD <3 Really glad we did this and we will for sure be back! MUST TRY IN UBUD :-)

Silver Class is A++++. I gained a whole new appreciation for how much work goes into a hand made Bali silver jewelry. We spent 2 hours making a pendent and I learned so much in that short time about working with silver. Everyone associated with Chez Monique is like family. They really care about your experience and spend a great deal of time helping you not only with the process, but also fine-tuning every little detail so that your finished piece looks like you bought it at a local boutique. I would highly recommend this class for everyone. I am NOT artistically inclined and my pendent came out incredibly professional. You will be glad you took this class and will walk away with a keepsake you will have forever.

Amazing time at Chez Monique. My husband and I had a fabulous time at the workshop. We really enjoyed ourselves making our own piece of jewellery that we both wanted to come back again to make another piece, but as we were on our honeymoon we had other places to go so was sad that we couldn't. Wayan was so welcoming and helpful. I highly recommend to try out this place if you like to be creative!

Simply amazing.. My daughter and I went to Chez Monique last year and had such a great time we rebooked for this year. Again we were not disappointed, Wayan makes you so welcome and Mowgli was so helpful and patient. Nothing is too hard and the resulting piece of jewellery is always so good you can't believe you made it yourself. We enjoyed ourselves so much we are going back again this week.

Fantastic! Would highly recommend!'. We found this on trip advisor while looking for what to do while in Ubud on holiday and we're so glad we did! Wayan was so welcoming and friendly and he and his silversmiths were so helpful! They have books of ideas for what to make or if you have your own design they will help you with that! I made earrings and my husband made me a necklace to match and they are beautiful!! The silversmiths were great, they showed you what to do then let you do it so by the end we had a real sense of accomplishment that we had actually made the jewellery! A great way to spend a few hours in ubud and I would recommend it to anyone!! Plus it's really good value for money, 450,000rupiah per person and that includes the piece that you get to take home!

Such a unique experience!. I was greeted with a warm & friendly hug, I was lucky enough to be the only person in the class so I got extra special attention I think! absolutely nothing was a problem with these two amazing silversmiths. They made what I had in my mind come to a reality even though I made a few mistakes they can easily fix them absolutely no problem! When he offers you a coffee make sure you get a coffee- it was the best coffee I've had in Bali so far. The quality of the ring that I made is 100% I definitely recommend this place even just to have a memory of your time here.

Better Souvenir than a Bin tang t-Shirt!. This was a great opportunity to create a unique piece of jewellery. My skills were no match for my enthusiasm and design, thankfully Wayan and his team (especially Mogi) were incredibly patient and I finished with a beautiful unique ring exactly as I imagined! If you are looking for stones to use in your jewellery, visit Batu Batu on Jin Raya they have an amazing selection.

Most inspiring, educational and fun 2 days. Wayan is the most welcoming and lovely person we met on our visit to Bali. I do silver smiting at home in Melbourne and wanted to learn how to set a stone in a ring I had designed. I had recently attended a 2 day course in Melbourne and they were unable to help me, which is why I thought i would try when I was in Ubud. Wayane and his team looked at the design, the silver and stone I had taken along and after 5 minutes of rapid discussions between themselves they had determined the best approach.For the next 3.5 hours we cut, filed, soldered, polished and set the stone. Because I have worked with silver before they were more than happy to let me do as much as I wanted along the way and answered all of my endless questions.By the end of the day I was so excited about the ring I had made and the amount of new skills I had learned, I went off to buy myself another stone at a local store and then went back the day after to make another ring. I learned more in these 2 half days than I could ever have hoped to and have come back with so many new skills.I already have plans to head back to Ubud in a few months to do some more silver work with Wayan and his team.Whether you are new to silver work or have done some before Wayan and his team will look after you and ensure you have a fantastic time while creating something unique to you.

Such a fun afternoon. My husband and I were recently in Ubud for 4 days and we decided to do a silver class after visiting the Chez Monique shop.The lady at the store was lovely, ringing to make sure we could go at a time that suited us. She suggested taking photos of what we might like to make to save time when we got to the class. We showed up at the workshop and it was a traditional Balinese home. We were unsure if it was the right place but we were waved in, so off we went. We were greeted by Wayan with a big hug as if we were old friends.We showed him the designs that we wanted to make and he put us to work sketching our designs, with a promise to help if we couldn't do it. After our sketches had passed scrutiny we were off to bring them to life.With Wayan's help, and the help and patience of his two other workers, our designs became jewellery. It was a really great way to spend an afternoon. Learning and creating something that we would never do at home was very rewarding and completely do-able even for us beginners! If you're done with the same old tourist traps I would definitely recommend spending an afternoon at Chez Monique.

How good? So good we are going back!. Wayan and his team of expert silver smith jewellers are just amazing. We took our two 7.5 year old boys one morning for a class. Wayan is just so kind and patient with kids, recognising one child was extremely good at drawing and personally encouraging him to create his own necklace from his imagination. We all had a marvellous time in a family compound with a caring team. For two days it's all that my boys have been able to talk about. They want to go back. We've already rebooked to visit again later this week but if my kids had their way they'd go back every day. This is a not to be missed class and just so good for families.

Fabulous Experience. We were warmly received by Wayang upon arrival and his team wasted no time in guiding my girls to start on designing and producing their silver pieces. In fact, my mother-in-law was so intrigued, she crafted a piece of her own too!Wayang and his team guide us through each stage of the production, from drawing the design, to cutting out the outline, to melting the parts together and even polishing the pieces. granny & girls had great fun and my 6 year old is immensely proud of her very own pandant.Thank you, Wayang and team for the fabulous experience.

Fun, informative and well run. Having read all the reviews on TripAdvisor we booked a silver making class with Wayan and Monique - we're so glad we did. It was fun, informative and we made a lovely ring each. Our designs were quite basic as we aren't very artistic but some of the other people were doing some amazing designes. Wayan was funny and the rest of the guys were really helpful. If you're looking for an interesting way to spend a morning or afternoon, try this. Definitely recommend. 450,000 per person but this includes the item you make (up to a certain weight).

Fun, creative and exceptional day. A great place to create your own design jewellery or use designs supplied. Teacher was wonderful, so encouraging, skilled and patient. I have never made a piece of jewellery before, and I do other artwork. I would do this again. Thanks for an enjoyable day and I would do it again given the opportunity. Loved being in the family environment as well.

Great fun, and excellent help. Had a fantastic morning here. Wayan and his staff were so friendly. There was no rush, with plenty of books to choose a design if you did not already have one. A cold water on arrival was welcome also. I was able to do a practice, which was lucky. I needed the practice. The patience shown was incredible. I made myself a ring with my three boys names inside, and three stick figure boys around the outside. I'm not sure anyone would pay good money for it, but I love it. Thanks Wayan and your staff. I would love to come back with my boys girlfriends next year and have another shot.

An afternoon well spent. Very pleasant place. Don't expect a posh area but this place is a true silver smith workshop. It's an open area but when we were there, a constant breeze was going. We did not make any booking and just rocked up (in hindsight we should have called ahead). We were lucky some folks were finishing and they had space for our family (hubby and myself & 8 yo + 5 yo). They were readily helping our young kids with design ideas and throughout the entire process. The kids did a pendant each and our pair of rings took much longer than expected but I'm very delighted with the outcome albeit we ended up rushing to finish as everyone was famished! Recommended and best to come with some ideas.

Book it now!. Wonderful from start to finish. We visited in during our trip to Bali at the end of May. Wayan was one of the nicest people we met in Bali.We made our own jewellery, (a silver ring and bangle). Everyone was so friendly, we were offered a drink on arrival and thoroughly enjoyed creating our special items. It cost 1million rupiah, we were there all morning!! Very reasonable. Book it now, you won't be disappointed!!
Awesome place!!. This place was fantastic!! I'm not very creative/artistic but the staff was so wonderful and it came out with a ring I love!

A must do in Ubud. We had an awesome time at Chez Monique silver class and came away with some really beautiful rings we made ourselves. The class was really hands on and I was surprised by how much we were able to do ourselves. The staff were so helpful and encouraging, it was definitely the best class we did during our entire Bali holiday. The end products are even better than the pictures on the website! Thanks again Chez Monique, hope to see you again next time!

Favourite place so far.. We got lost in the morning but stumbled across Chez Monique boutique store. The lady there got a fantastically friendly driver to take us to the studio. There we were greeted with hugs and fantastic tasting coffee. Even though we were incredibly late, they fit us in, and we drew a simple sketch of the engagement ring we wanted to make. We brought our own stone, and the craftsmen there worked with us to make an absolutely fantastic looking ring. I could not give this place a higher recommendation. Aaaaaa+++++

Honeymoon gifts. My wife and I came here on our honeymoon so we could make a gift for each other. We decided on rings. The owner and staff were extremely friendly and we had a great time. We did everything except the blow-torch soldering as this looked quite dangerous. It is well priced with each ring costing on average £25 at the end! I recommend emailing the owner first so the class is not too full. There was only one other couple when we had our session.

Wayan is the best!. Worth every penny, great experience with patient and helpful guides. Wayan is like your sweetest uncle abroad, just so kind! My friend made a hammer bracelet and I made 3 dainty twist rings. Felt like I could change my field of work after the class haha! Thanks Wayan, see you soon!!!!

Great prices!. My partner and I did the ring making course together and loved it. It's a great activity to add and gets you using your brain again. The best party is taking home your very own personalised piece. Super friendly, well spoken teachers. Warm family. $45-50 AUD. I was recommended by three seperate friends, none of whom know one another and I too would recommend it :)

Most fun and meaningful experience in Bali!. When my husband and I planned our honeymoon in Bali months ago, we decided to make our own wedding bands at Chez Monique. We had a vague idea of what we wanted to make, and Wayan and his team guided us with ideas and suggestions to make everything feasible. We sawed out our own designs, engraved, and hammered, while one of the silversmiths helped with soldering and oxidizing. It took my husband ~2.5 hours to make my ring, and it took me 3.5 hours to make his. Now we have the coolest wedding bands for under $80USD total! No matter your skill level or whether you arrive knowing what to make, you'll end up with a beautiful and personalized piece of jewelry.  *THE CLASS IS NOT LOCATED AT THE CHEZ MONIQUE SHOP ON GOOGLE MAPS*. The class address on TripAdvisor is correct (Wayan also emails it to you, but we didn't read carefully); it's within walking distance of the shop itself, but write down the class address to save yourself some time from feeling lost like we did.

Highly recommend!. Went into it unsure, but ended up loving it! This was a perfect creative outlet for me and a nice break from sight seeing. You can pick out from books they have what design you are looking for or you can draw your own! They are very, very nice and will help you through the whole process. I loved it so much I am going to go back! Thank you for my one-of-a-kind piece!

how good is this place. Our 13 year old daughter did this class and made some earrings.The silver smiths helped her make the pieces herself and ended up stunning.The owner is one nice person that is one of the most positive people i have met.If your into making stuff and arty then this is for you.

Lots of fun & a beautiful souvenir . We really enjoyed designing and making the jewellery, the staff were all lovely and really helpful - such a great way to spend an afternoon (especially as it was pouring with rain!). We were so pleased to come out with jewellery that looked so good, I made a pair of stacking rings and thy are beautiful - I wear them every day!

The best silver class in town. Last year we tried another silver class and didn't like it too much - there wasn't enough help so you sat around a lot waiting for the next step and the staff wasn't very friendly. Chez Monique was totally different! Friendly, tons of help, great ideas, tasty snacks, water, fans to cool us off, all in a lovely family compound a short walk from the center of Ubud. This is the class to pick - take it from us!

Planeteers wish they had their rings made here. A worthwhile stop in Ubud for couples, especially on a rainy day. Owner (forgot his name) is very personable, and you can pretty much make whatever you imagine. Recommend it!

Tons of fun!. My wife and I greatly enjoyed this class. The silver smiths give you several books of designs to look through until you find something you like or come up with a design on your own. Then the smiths help you create your design with all the needed tools. There are several smiths in each class to help the students and all are friendly and willing to help. Friendly can-do atmosphere. I would recommend this to anyone!

Personalised Jewellery. Our last day in Ubud was a jewellery making class. Absolutely enjoyed it and walked away with a unique personal piece of jewellery representing my family. They were so knowledgeable and helpful. They had books of ideas so you if went along not knowing what you wanted to make there are plenty of ideas to give you inspiration. I knew I wanted to include my husbands, my and my kids initials and they showed me how easy it was to do what I envisioned

Another unique item made. Just had my 2nd visit to Chez Monique, and had as much fun as last time. This time I made earrings, it was nice to try out some different techniques.A definite recommend for people of all age groups

Do it!. Short review. One family of four, some hours invested, and not too much money for what you walk away with. Balinese patience and culture. Traditional craftsmanship. Four beautiful heirlooms and gifts.What a fantastic experience and fantastic memories.Do it!

Really fun! Plus you get a one of a kind souvenir.. Our group of 5 varied from 50+ year old to a 10 year old and we all had fun. We stayed a night at Ubud and thought this would be a fun activity. The family was very welcoming and kind. It was a intimate setting that had everything you needed. The smaller class size was great as you would get plenty of help when you needed it plus you get to know the rest of the class (always fun to meet fellow travelers).At the start when you pick your design you may feel like you were a bit ambitious but believe me when i say that they will help you get the jewelry you wanted. Even when right at the very end one of the pendants didn't turn out right Wayan let us redo it until it was right. You get to do a lot more that you think with only guidance from Wayan and the guys, so you really do get to make your own. It really is a fun activity and lets you leave with something personal and unique. This was one of the highlights of my trip.

So much fun, I kept going back!. After I took my first class at Chez Monique, I was hooked! I went three times, and I had more and more fun each time I went! Wayan and his team are amazingly talented, kind, friendly and very patient. I wish I could have stayed in Bali and taken more classes. I was so thankful for the support - the team was ready to show me how to do what I needed to do, and in some cases help me finish when I got frustrated and couldn't saw anymore. I'm so thrilled with my creations and I think of Wayan and the team every time I wear them. If you would like to see more of the step-by-step, please check out my blog www.resetyoursoul.com/travel/silversmithing-in-ubud-bali

Such a great experience. I had an incredible 3 days learning so much from Wayan and the team at Chez Monique. My plan was to go and get a taste for silversmithing before a career change into making jewellery, what better way to do it than in Ubud with a true master like Wayan!!!

Wonderful experience with a lasting take home memory. My family including master 10 did the silversmith class whilst on an overnight stay in Ubud and I am so glad we did! You really do get to complete quite a lot of the work yourself so at the end when you have your completed product you really feel you have been helped to create something special. We all had fun and all of the team are very helpful throughout the entire process, I highly recommend this activity! Thank you so much Wayan and team, Terimah Kasih !

Great time Silversmithing!. My boyfriend came across the Chez Monique silver making class while surfing TripAdvisor. Because it got such great reviews we decided to give it a try. We had a wonderful time learning how to make silver. We were both surprised at how hands-on the class was. All of the silversmiths including owner Wayan Sunarta showed us the basic techniques and methods, but really let us do most of the work! We couldn't have been more pleased with our experience at Chez Monique and hope to visit again one day. We would highly recommend this class to anyone who is interested in learning the art of silversmithing. The people were great and we got to take home our very own handcrafted pieces of silver!
So much fun. We had a great time doing this class. Would highly recommend doing this . Chez and his team were great they guided you all the way. Thank you so much. Debbie and Wayne.
Awesome. We were here on the 11th may to handmade our engagement ring. Wayan is a good guy who will explain to us patiently. The whole class was so memorable and pleasant. Their handcraft is so good.

Hands on silver smith class. I was happy that this was a hands on class where I was able to make my own jewellery - without any previous experience. I didn't take your own design with me, so I looked through their many books for inspiration. I drew my design on paper which was used as a template. I was instructed on how to cut, saw, file and polish my necklace, which I did myself with guidance. I recommend arriving on time (or slightly early), as if you get there before others, you will get more one on one time which is good to get started. The classes are restricted to small numbers and take place in a family compound.Staff are very welcoming, helpful and supportive, water is provided and facilities are very clean. Highly recommend.
Ring for mum. I made this for Mother's Day. Wayan and Eko were so helpful. This leaf ring cost me 500k including the class fee.This is indeed something different in Bali.

Something different in Bali!. From the welcome hug and cold drink to leaving with a piece of unique jewellery that I made, we were made to feel very welcome. Wayan and his helpers were very patient and helpful. We were able to look through books to find something we liked or design our own piece as I did. We were helped through each process, from cutting out to polishing. They even fixed our mistakes! We could do as much or as little as we wished. No craft experience necessary. Thank you Wayan for a great morning and a memorable experience. We will be back if we get the chance!

Jewellery repair in Ubud. I had a couple of pieces that needed simple repairs and was recommended to come here. They did a great job of repairing my silver chain and ring. Was ready overnight and was reasonably priced. Would recommend!

Amazing experience!. My friend and I came here after hearing a rave review about the place from a fellow traveller. We are so glad we did! We felt so genuinely welcomed and the skilled silver smiths here really helped us create some amazing jewellery while encouraging us to do as much of the making process ourselves. This is an experience I will never forget and I will treasure the unique jewellery we made here. Thank you!
Magnificent Monique!. Thank you for the wonderful experience! A lovely setting and such helpful people. Help me made exactly what I wanted!

fantastic experience!. I would highly recommend this silver class! Great teachers and we made beautiful pieces. The only problem was we were in a hurry and wanted to make more. Next time! Great value as you get a nice piece to wear.

Amazing experience! . Such an amazing experience! The teachers were so lovely, big hugs and made you feel at home with tea and coffee. They have huge amounts of patience when you make a mistake! They have lot of books to help with ideas. You then help cut the metal, shape it, engrave it, sand and polish your jewellery. A great way to remember Bali. They then trusted us to go back to the shop from the workshop to pay by card. Thank you!

Chez Magnifique. That Ubud is unmissable is a given. But the surprising delight of designing and creating your very silver keepsake is such fun. Wayan and his team give support and design advice and make the silver jewellery class a successful experience for everyone. The setting of the class is in the compound of a Balinese home and it feels like a privilege to be there. The two teenage girls in our group rated the afternoon 11/10. Taking part in this class was the highlight of our trip.

tranquil creativity. I felt honoured to be invited inside this authentic Balinese family compound. The atmosphere is so tranquil and relaxed that even the least artistic person will enjoy the creating of their own piece of unique jewellery. The quiet, gentle, patient but highly professional guidance and assistance that is given by various in-house artisans at any time during the process, the lack of being rushed by time restrictions and the vast choices of items made in this class create an unforgettable experience. Whilst her husband was looking after all the students on an individual basis Monique quietly replenished vases brimming with colourful flowers and offered us bowls of delicious exotic fruits, which to some visitors was an adventure in itself. Spotlessly clean bathroom facilities were available to us. I will definitely return for my next design on my next trip to Bali. The trip to Ubud is worth it from any location in Bali just for this joyful activity. Go! Go! Go!P.S.: I am really not artistic at all but I am quite proud to show off my finished product.

Creative Morning in Ubud. Chez Monique Jewelry studio class was super and even better been the only one! They are very welcoming and friendly, nothing to complain about. I came with an idea of what I wanted to make before arriving so there was no need to go through inspiration books however they are there if needed. The process was interesting and explained very clearly. The end result was better than I expected! Cant wait to return with a group of friends!

Rings and necklaces . Really good class. Great quality silversmiths. Really caring and understanding for people of all skills.A little hard to get to, but once you are there it doesn't matter because you are surrounded in a good environment, with great teachers that create a good atmosphere.

such a wonderful way to spend an afternoon in Ubud. Myself and my partner dropped by to this place in the hope that we could book in for later that day and Wayan was so accommodating, he said to us just to sit down and start then and there if we liked which was awesome. The workshop is in his home compound and he and his family are super welcoming and accommodating, always offering you drinks and making sure you're feeling at home. The class itself was so much fun, its a really relaxed setting and they all help you on your way, encourage you, teach you and make sure you end up really happy with your piece. i couldn't recommend it more, id definitely love to go back! Thanks so much!

Loved it. My 19 year old daughter and I did a silver jewellery making class with Chez Monique and loved it. Chez and his staff were really helpful and encouraging and we both managed to produce a piece we were proud of. It was a lovely experience to work within the grounds of a family home with Chez's family going about there daily business around us. We think it is a "must do" activity if you're in Ubud.

the silver ring and the memory will last forever 手工银戒指恒久远，美好的记忆永相传. i once wrote a review both in chinese and english for my freediving class. after did silver class here, i told mr. wayan sunarta that i wanna do the same.after ashtanga yoga practice, i just walked on the steet and looked around, occsionally i found a lable "silver class", i like handmade, so i walked in the house and meet wayan--then i know what does "wayan" mean--the eldest son the the family who take more responsibility for the family. i am also eldest in my family. after talking and then i took part in the silver class in next few days. wayan and the other two staffes are so kind and easygoing, so their family. i like to spend time with them, and they will not only in my diary but memory. then the silver class is very interesting, not only me felt this, but all my classmates got the same feeling. we students or traveller are from 20 years old to 65, even more ! and from china to australia, from northern to southern !thank you guys, if i go to bali, i will visit you again! do you like chinese tea, buddy?曾经用英文和中文双语给我的自由潜水课写过一篇回顾，当我在这个课堂上给朋友做了一些银饰品后，我告诉wayan先生，我会用中文和英文双语写一篇回顾，以表示感谢和尊重。在练习阿斯汤加瑜伽之后，我每天会在街上四处看看，偶然遇到了银饰手工制作，于是就走了进去。和wayan先生聊了一会儿后，在随后的几天了，来到这里，给朋友制作了一些银饰礼物。。后来，我明白了wayan的名字的含义，是巴厘岛风俗中，家中的长子,承担着更多的家庭责任。。我和他一样，也是家中的长子。制作银饰的职员很容易相处，开心的时光，美好的记忆。同学们或者旅行者来自世界各地，遍布南北半球，年龄从20岁到65岁，老少皆宜。谢谢你们，假如我再去巴厘岛，一定会再去看你们。 对了，你们喜欢中国茶吗？：）

Loved it!. I took my nearly 18 year old son to Bali for the first time and wanted to do something with him that he would enjoy and remember. This was one of the activities we chose and we both loved it. We had a fantastic morning together designing our pieces (we both chose rings) and then being assisted to make them. The class was quite hands on and a great introduction to silver jewelry making. Both pieces came out very professional and Wayan and his staff were very helpful and friendly.I also loved that the class is held in Wayan's home, it gave us an insight to Balinese way of life which my son found very interesting.I highly recommend this class, the piece you come away with is worth so much more than the cost. I have a ring that i now where everyday and it reminds me of an amazing time spent with my son in a beautiful location. When friends see it they are so suprised that "I made it" as the finish is so professional.

A must do activity to appreciate Ubud and Balinese art. We wanted to sprinkle in some activity during our Ubud trip and thought this would be a great way to mix things up. Wayan teaches out of his house which is a great way to observe how they live. The staff including Wayan were extremely patient , warm and skilled. I made a pendant shaped in the form of a dog (my wife's pet) and she made a ring for me. It was an amazing experience and made us appreciate the work. Great value for money and you take back a piece of Bali with you.

Highly recommend!. I went not really knowing what to expect and had a really good time and came home with a much better piece of craftsmanship than I thought I was capable of. All of the teachers were very friendly and helpful. They were very patient in showing the students how to do things themselves, but also very helpful if somebody needed or wanted something done for them. Ive already been thinking about other pieces I want to make if I make it back to Ubud on this trip!

Fantastic class! A must do!!. Myself and my partner booked a private class to spend some time together designing and making rings. Wayan and his team were super friendly and couldn't have been more accommodating, helping us to choose our designs. They showed us all the steps and helped us along the way with a smile and friendly chatting the whole time. The local is great and I was amazed with the end results, being uselessly uncreative I didn't have much hope for my own creation but both rings were amazing and I don't think I'll be taking mine off. I have uploaded some photos of our rings. It's great value for money and one of the highlights of our trip!! Wayan even dropped us in town once we had completed our class to spare us getting soaked due to a serious downpour. Thank you so much Wayan and your team. We will see you the next time we are back in Bali :)

' Loved it and I now have a pendant I wear every day'. Wayan was a great teacher who made the whole experience enjoyable and rewarding. My friend and I looked at all the other works that everyone had made and could not believe how beautiful and well done the jewellery photos were. There were helpers who showed you how to do the work too. We found it totally absorbing and now I have a momento that I wear every day.

A highlight of my trip. Patient and masterful craftsmen. A really enjoyable few hours spent there and a great 'souvenir' to take away from Bali. Workshop was fuss-free and fun. My friends and I had a fantastic time there, definitely recommend it to others. Will help to have a design in mind before attending the workshop so you won't be caught in a dilemma. However, there are also design catalogs available if you don't have a custom design ready.
Amazing experience. Fantastically Friendly staff, such an amazing time making your own jewllery from scratch. Would love to do this again!

Deceptively easy, great deal. My piece turned out far better than expected, especially being someone so uncreative. Everyone there was helpful and friendly. It's an easygoing atmosphere and you can make anything you want with 11g of silver for just 450k rupia (40 USD).

Enjoyable afternoon of silversmithing. Note the studio is about a mile from the shop and in a back courtyard. It is best to visit their website first and choose a design and then you can make a ring or bracelet or pendant in a few hours. You will draw your pattern, then use a jewelers saw to cut out your pattern and they will show you how to solder, then you polish your project. I have some silversmithing experience, but enjoyed learning new techniques and they were very helpful and delightful to work with. Many students spent multiple sessions with them. Their prices were fair and they had good quality silver to work with. Highly recommend for a unique experience.

Great for couples. If you are a couple who maybe doesn't want to spend your afternoon baking in the hot sun and are looking for a meaningful fun activity together, this is the place for you. We made our first couple rings here, together, and we were very pleased with the result. You can also make other jewelry here, such as pendants. The process for us was to select a design, cut the pieces of silver and polish them. Any soldering is done by them. Well worth it!

Excellent experience!. My friend and I visited chez monique in january, one of the best experiences ive had in Bali! The most welcoming, helpful and friendly staff! I made a ring and will cherish it forever. I will definately be back next time im in Ubud. Highly recommend!!

An opportunity to express creativity with a loving family who are passionate and inviting. We were greeted by the lovely Kethut in their family compound. Our ideas were absolutely validated and they helped us create two new rings that will forever reminds us of our first time to Bali. Thanks to Kethut for making the experience fun and helping to co-ordinate the making of our gorgeous rings.

A must do activity when in ubud!. We loved the whole experience. Absolutely could not believe what we made under the guidance of the lovely Wayan. A great way to spend an afternoon in Ubud and you can go home and day 'i made this! '

can't talk about this highly enough. we met our teacher in the afternoon were greated by hugs, cold water and coffee and given some ideas.. were shown expertly how to make our products and they turned out for better then we ever could have imagined.. the class was very small and very intimate.. it was just amazing.

Amazing experience!. Wayan and his team are so lovely and helpful and made our experience fun! Would recommend to anyone that loves hands on and has a few hours to spare. Very reasonably priced too and they help you make the design you choose!

Super fun! Wonderful experience! A must do if you have half a day!!. During our short trip to Bali, Chez Monique workshop was the number one thing my husband and I wanted to do on our short to do list, and it certainly did not dissapoint! Wayan was the perfect host and teacher! Initially we had organised a 1:30 pm class two weeks before arriving in Bali but due to last minute changes to our schedule I had to request an earlier class, I emailed Wayan the night before and he emailed back with a reply straight away.  The class was very hands on (which is what I loved about it) and wayan and his team was always there to help us when needed. We were guided and shown each step of the way but if there was a process I wasn't confident in (for me it was soldering and machine polishing) they were happy to complete the process for me. A good tip would be to come prepared with a design in mind. But even if you haven't or you happen to be uninspired or artistically challenged. Wayan provides plenty of photographed designs to inspire you or to copy from. We ended up with great results and it was so much fun! I would definitely do it again next time we visit Bali!
Great experience. Wayan was lovely. We made a bracelet and a ring and Wayan accommodated all of our requests regarding design and creativity.Fun activity to do!

Not really a class, more of a pick a design. This was a birthday surprise for me, so that made it a lovely experience. However, as far as a class, there was not class. You are greeted by an extremely friendly owner, who gives you books of designs to look through. Comes back and says what do you want to make. We chose rings, he gives you the size rings to try, then his silversmith goes off the cut the silver. I was waiting for the class, he takes you to a table, gives you a hammer, and some stamps, "bangs one on a test piece and says, you do this to try and walks off. That was the class. The rest is done by his staff, I would have liked to have more of a class, we actually followed his staff around until one gave in and let us polish our end results.Nice rings, I have never worn silver before but mine is so scratched after 1 month I don't wear it anymore.He must make a lot as you have to get your own way there, nothing included but the silver and water and its in his home so he's not paying rent, and only 2 staff, there were 12 on the day we were there.
So much fun . Would definitely recommend. Three of us each made a ring. Could choose designs or create your own. Staff were lovely and so helpful

Wonderful experience. I was reading so much about Silver smithing. So when I did this class, a dream came true. The three teachers were very friendly, and supported me so much to get my piece of jewellery exactly how I want it. The place was cosy and I met wonderful people. I am very thankful for this experience and I will come back and do another class.

Fantastic Ubud workshop!. Fantastic silver jewelry making opportunity in Unud. In the family's home compound, you are greeted by a warm and welcoming family and what my friend swears is the best coffee she's had in Bali. You draw your own design on paper and then it's cut and glued to a piece of silver, when you then go about the task if cutting the design. The family will help with attaching earring stems and pendant loops, removing the paper and they will show you how to use all of the tools to complete the work. Very kind, encouraging and talented family! You can visit their store on Dewisita by Juice Ja for inspiration but the class is held up on sriwedari.All levels of skill will be rewarded with a great experience and a little something shiny to take home!

Create your own masterpiece here. You can bring your own gem, design, idea, old items to convert into jewelries ...but even if you dont, fret not, they have large collection of designs you can get inspiration or choose from. U can bring ur family and friends to make something customized and memorable. Cheers.

Amazing experience , amazing people.. My family and I enjoyed this class one afternoon. It was great fun, we learnt so much. Both my children loved it, my son is 9 and daughter 14.y husband and I made some beautiful jewelry that I have been wearing since. It's very affordable, easy to find, and we loved the staff. Wayan, the owner, is a beautiful soul and makes amazing coffee. We will visit every trip to Bali .

Love my jewellery!!. We spent the most wonderful afternoon at Chez Monique in August last year and I have been very slow to get around to my review. We went to the class as some friends had been and loved it. The afternoon was perfect. We were encouraged to be creative but also given ideas when needed. I took an opal in a very old setting that I had for years and Wayans assistant helped me to reset it into a modern ring that I have worn every day since the class. I absolutely love it!! My husband made me a beautiful silver pendant In a wave pattern that is so professional looking people do not believe that he made it. Highly recommend taking the time to visit for fun and something completely different (the handmade jewellery is a lovely bonus). Sue and Nick, Perth WA

Lovely silversmithing experience. Three of us went and made small silver items. A ring and two pendants between us. Really enjoyed doing and we were encouraged to do add much as we could by ourselves but had enough help that we are all very happy with what we made and it is all wearable too. Which given my lack of skills with handy crafts was one of fears . Great experience.  We went to the shop afterwards to find some more silver bits for friends and was disappointed it wasn't ' fix price' as we lacked the confidence to barter so went elsewhere. We would have liked to support the business that had already made us so welcome.

A diffrent and lovely memory/activity!. We often get so bored of all the touristattractions since all companys offering or selling exactly the same activitys or things instead of doing something diffrent and uniq, to stand out from everyone else. We found this lovely little silver smith class and was very exited when we arrived. We did not get dissapointed! We have been travelling for almost 6 months with so much funny and beautiful memories. But I got ill and we both had a great loss and decided to stay in Ubud to heal and sorrow. So this was an activity to try to distract our feealings just for a moment. We didn't know when we arrived what we wanted to do and they had tons of pictures to look at for inspiration. When we sat down an idea started to grow of making a symbol for all our memories from this trip, both the good and the more sad ones. It ended up in two identical rings for me and my fiance with a secret inprint in the second language in New Zealand, maori. I added the infinity symbol to mine otherwise they look exactly the same. It became such a beautiful and touching memory for us that we have to quietly cry a bit before we started. The staff is so friendly and really helpful. You can see that they enjoy doing this and the class is held in their own home. We felt very welcome and the english was exeptionally good. If you want to do something completly diffrent comparing to the "normal" touristy things, then this is it. Go ahead and create a memoriy that for sure will last forever. /Linn & Mattias, Sweden

Lots of Fun!. We came here on the recommendation of a friend who attended a few weeks prior. We came after having a lovely bike ride in the morning. We were told it would take about 3 - 4 hours. There were four of us, two teenagers and two mums. We were greeted by welcoming hugs and bottles of water. The class is conducted in an affluent family compound outside of the shopping area of Ubud. We were provided with books showing various rings, bracelets and pendants. There were two other teachers and two other customers. Three of us chose bracelets and one chose a ring found on the internet. We were helped throughout the process but must admit chose not to do too much ourselves. There is only so much you can do in four hours plus we were a little tired. I found that they worked with you as one the other customers was much more hands on. It's up to you. The end product was great and I paid a little more for mine as I made a bangle which was much bigger that the others. We loved our finished products. The owners wife even brought out some spring rolls as it was close to dinner time. As I said in the beginning this is a family compound so expect the extended family to act as if you're not there. We saw Uncles, cousins and grandparents which was lovely. We even saw a cousin going to have a shower in his jocks. We were thankful he had them on. LOL. Note: If you do not have cash you are asked to walk to the store which is in the shopping precinct about 25 minutes away as we had difficulty finding it, to process your credit card. There is some great jewellery and restaurants here. Give it a go and you'll end up with a great piece of jewellery!

Silver making. Had an absolutely great time, and cannot thank Wayan and his family enough for the wonderful hospitality. His passion and encouragement helped us create treasures and memories that will last a lifetime. This is highly recommend, and we will defiantly be communicating with him in the future. Very reasonable. Thank you for the water and fruit,also.

Fantastic day at chez monique ubud silversmith class.. I booked a class at Chez Monique silver workshop. It was fantastic, I made a silver pendant , and I am so pleased with it!! They are friendly and so helpfully, and they help you to make something very special . The best day yet! Highly recommend this course. Five stars .

Fantastic experience. What a fantastic experience I had, making my own silver jewelry!I had an idea of what I wanted but I'm not very good at drawing so I thought it would not be possible to do what I had in mind. But I actually could!! With the help of Wayan and his lovely staff, I started working and the result is awesome. Lucky me, I will have some more time to spend in Ubud so I will go back an make another ring with a little stone (you can bring your own).Would recommend it to everyone!

Awesome experience!. I love creative activities on vacation, and this one was one of the best. Everyone was super friendly and started us off with sample books but then encouraged us to put our own unique twists on the designs. Then, after sketching out the image for us on paper, they put us to work! It was great to have such a large part in creating our jewelry - by the end, it was definitely a piece that we felt responsible for. I highly recommend this class to anyone who has a few hours to spend in Ubud.

Fantastic! What a fantastic holiday memory..and one we can wear!!. Wow. Thankyou wayan!!We had a fantastic day. Our creations were beautiful and it was a lovely small group with which to share our day. Wayan even spent one on one time with my 7 year old son and he made a gorgeous pendant necklace...thankyou for the bowl of icecream for my son!! He was very happy (so i was happy!!). Just remember to bring your own gems if you want to incorporate them into your creation!!My son has asked to go back already and make another piece of jewellery!

Great way to spend a day. Magic way to spend a day with a fantastic souvenir to take home and best of all I made it, my unfortunately it was no where near as good as my partners effort which frankly made mine look second rate .. Ah well we will have to go back .. Make sure you do this we loved it .. Ideal if hot, raining , or both. Paul. England

Wow . What a fantastic way to spend time. I highly recommend Chez Monique. The skills and patience are unlimited. I am still walking around showing off my new bracelet. I will be heading straight back as soon as possible. I have a lasting memory of my trip that I will always wear. Unbeatable value .

Interesting and different. We visited Chez Monique's silver smith class and found really quite interesting. You get to pick a design and work on it for a couple of hours all the while with expert advice and assistance through the process.The class really isn't a group class though their are times listed. We arrived at the class start time and others were already working on their projects so it feels more like one-on-one tutoring. If you pick a more complex design, you will need more assistance unless you have previous experience. Also if you select a more complex pattern, you will probably end up paying more than the stated class price as there will be more silver required.A really interest and different experience all in all and we would definitely recommend this to others.

Jewelry Making Class i Ubud. I had a fantastic morning creating a piece of jewelry.Wayan patiently guided me through the whole process from design to finished article.There are plenty of folders of examples if you have difficulty being imaginative.I now have one of the best holiday momentos.I was at the class for about 2.5 to 3 hours but could have been longer, there was no set time.The class took place in very pleasant surroundings, I was offered refreshments.Wayan likes to use your camera to record you busy working on your article.

Would recommend. the guys her are so nice and really keen to give you a nice piece to take home, they were friendly, welcoming and very helpful. I would say go with some idea of what you want to mAke but there are lots of folders for I spiration. Would go back and do another piece if I had more time.
Great Balinese experience!. This was very fun! Get creative and learn some new skills! This is fun for the whole family. Going back for the second time today :) highly recomend it !!

A new appreciation for handmade silver jewellery!. We didn't really know what to expect, but had been told by friends this wasa great way to spend the morning. And it was. Apart from me having no idea how hard/tedious my "simple" jewellry design turned out to be, it was great! The staff were so patient and helpful. And i will know offer to pay DOUBLE for any handmade item of jewellery after discovering how much effort goes into some pieces! Cost of the class is based on how much silver your design uses, not how long it takes you (or the staff) to finish it. Mine was approx $40aus for a pendant about 5cm x 4cm. And it's something that will make me think of lovely Ubud everytime i wear it.

SO much fun! Lovely momentos of our Ubud holiday. My daughter and I joined Wayan's classes with no particular expectations and no design plans. The experience was beyond our expectations - Wayan and his team were so friendly and helpful with design books and suggestions to inspire us. The interesting, enjoyable process culminated in two very wearable, stylish rings. A lovely touch was being able to stamp a message/our names on the inside of the ring. My daughter's ring involved slightly more detail - their interest was in creating a lovely item, not the extra time it took. Taking a picture or design is worth it, otherwise their books have heaps of ideas. The men who came with their partners surprised themselves, leaving delighted with their new-found creative pieces. You don't have to be "crafty" to do this. Would love to visit again on next visit to Ubud.

Unique Bali Experience. A big thank you to Wayan and his lovely team for the enjoyable silver making class we recently did. Myself and 4 girlfriends had a great time making individual pieces of jewellery that we will treasure always. If you visit Ubud you really must give this a go, great way to spend a couple of hours.

Unusual, interesting, friendly. Book at least 24 hours in advance during holiday season, and have some idea if what you'd like make. This was a great thing to do. I was surprised how much I learnt and the quality of the piece I could make under instruction. The silversmiths are very friendly and attentive. The class is small group so you get lots of help.
Creative break from adventure travel. This was our one Ubud course experience. It was a great 2 - 3 hour experience.Patient and knowledgeable staff. Very helpful and encouraging.Worth the time!!

Great activity for all ages.. I went to a class alone one day and had to return the next with my whole family. Everyone enjoyed making their own unique pieces of jewellery. Something for everyone (my 5 kids range in age from 5-22, boys and girls). Worth every rupiah.

Enjoyable and memorable experience!. I attended the class on Jan 2 and made a beautiful lotus flower pendant. Wayan and his colleagues were very supportive and helpful during this process. Despite my limited skills, they were very patient with me. I expected to be there for three hours as I am all thumbs, but I did manage to finish in less than two hours. My husband who is not impressed with anything, even commented on the jewelry and said that it was nicer than what we saw in most stores. Thank you Wayan for accommodating my last minute request for this class. I will always remember Bali when I wear my lotus flower pendant!
Great activity would recommend. Went along for fun made a great pice of jewellery each, people were super friendly and helpful. They looked excellent and it's awesome knowing you made it yourself.

Great experience for anyone who loves silver!. My husband and I visited the silver making class today. We both enjoyed the class very much Wayan our teacher made the class a very personalised experienced, greeted with a big smile and ice cold bottled water and given lots of help and direction during the class to help make some beautiful and personal silver pieces. Thank you again Wayan for a truly amazing experience!! This is a must do if visiting Ubud!!

Great fun and great products. My partner and I had a really great time at the Chez Monique silversmith classes! They had many idea booklets for you to choose from or were happy to accommodate custom designs. We both picked customs designs and were guided through each step of the process to ensure the design came out as per our imaginations and not as per our actual skills! The proprietor is incredibly welcoming, we were offered refreshments multiples times throughout the class. It is a family- run business and their knowledge and skills are evident. It is definitely popular so rig ahead and make a booking to ensure your place

Jewellery making for the soul!. After returning to Chez Monique for a 2nd time I enjoyed the jewellery making experience even more. The silversmiths were on hand to encourage us as we created our very own piece of silver jewellery. Fun,educational,meditative,wonderful! 10/10 Maria

Great experience. The class was so much fun. We could create our own design and they helped us realize it. It was also very fair how they advised us what to make and how big in order to keep costs for additional silver low. My friend and I we both did well with the amount that was included in the course fee. All in all absolutely worth doing it. Make sure to make a reservation by phone or in their jewelry shop at least one day in advance since workstations are limited.

A beautiful hand crafted piece of jewellery that I made!. A wonderful afternoon – Had quite a long walk up a long incline to get to it though so I recommend finding someone to drive you there – walking back is fine though! there were only 3 of us and 2 instructors who were extremely patient and got you started and stepped in if you needed help but they really left you to your own devices! They have books of ideas in case you have no idea what you want to make but they also welcome ideas of your own so if you have drawings or pictures of ideas they can help you and guide you by telling you how it will work. They will help you by telling you how fasteners will be affixed and how that could change the design as well. You can also stamp lettering into your jewellery I chose Bali Nov 14! It was a great afternoon and very affordable perfect especially for girls of all ages in my opinion and you get to take home your very own memory and piece of Bali.It was great seeing my ring being created from the dull piece of silver into a beautiful shiny piece of jewellery that no one else will have!

Fun Day!. My teenage daughter & I, along with my friend & her two daughters took a class in September & loved it! We spent over four hours making our masterpieces that we will have forever as a token of our time in Bali. The staff were really helpful & I really needed the help........ It was a fun way to spend an afternoon, in lovely surrounds with lots of laughs. I would highly recommend anyone looking for something different to do while in Bali to attend this class.

Warm hearted little class. Class was small (max 10) and had very good instructor coverage. Each two students shared one instructor and there were no questions left unanswered. Good thing is they let you do most of the work and only jump in to help you if you have difficulties, or giving your jewelry the last few % to make it perfect. The end product we came out with was definitely sell-worthy.Two minor drawbacks for which I deduct one point:1. In the design phase in the beginning, I specifically asked to use just as much silver to be fully covered by the standard fee, but was still charged 100k IDR more. I probably would have left it as tip anyways, but feel somewhat ripped off since I specified in the beginning that I would like to be covered by the standard rate2. The designs you see don't tell anything about difficulty or involved steps. Since this is a class and people enjoy the process, it would be great to know before choosing the design how the process would roughly look likeOverall would definitely recommend, but be sure to communicate well during design phase since that will determine how your whole class looks like.

10 Stars for Chez Monique. If I could give more stars to this incredible studio, there is no doubt in my mind that I would! I have spent the last 7 weeks in-and-out of Ubud and Chez Monique is where I've spent most of my time. I am a jewelry designer, and originally, I came to Bali to find inspiration and make pieces for my new series. Wayan, his family, and metal smiths welcomed me into the studio with open-arms, compassion, and a whole lot of patience. In every visit, I have been treated so well by Wayan, Mogi, & Eco, who have made my silversmithing dreams come to life. My experiences at Chez Monique have been and continue to be so enjoyable. They are very active and considerate of any design/creation, no matter how difficult or simple. The studio is very unique, as it is located in the family's compound. A true Balinese experience you cannot miss out on! I am so thankful of Wayan, his family, and team. I have learned so much from them about silversmithing and also about the Balinese culture as a whole. I hope to continue to return to Chez Monique in the future! Love to this blessed family & sacred studio :) Namaste!

Best thing i did in Bali. This place is hard to find but once you do you are warmly welcomed into the home and shown designs or you can make your own, the staff are helpful and friendly and i just want to go back to i can make more jewelry. Was a great experience in Ubud.

professional but personal. We showed up at short notice for this jewellery class, but there was no problem to take part in that particular afternoon class in late August. We were made to feel very welcome and received bottled water before we began the course. The main jeweller chatted with us first of all and then discussed with us what exactly we wanted to make. The simple hammered rings that we had decided on were relatively easy, but we still had plenty of guidance from the instructors who constantly wandered around to check on our progress and offer help and guidance. At the end of the afternoon, we had produced two lovely silver rings with an engraving on the inside of each. Although we were complete beginners, we were surprised at how “professional” our rings looked. Our experience at Chez Monique was memorable and enjoyable, particularly because of the relaxed atmosphere in the class. The course was well suited to beginners, as well as people with some experience of silver work. I would highly recommend it to anyone with an artistic flare or just some who wants to try something new in Ubud.

A delightfully unique experience. My husband and I spent a delightful couple of hours learning to make silver jewelry at the home/studio of Wayan and Monique. After a warm greeting, Wayan asked us to pick out a design we liked and proceeded to teach us the ABC's of working with silver. If we ran into trouble, he or one of the other silversmiths helped us out. In the end, we both had finished creations to take home. I would definitely recommend this as a fun way to spend a couple of hours - I mean when else are you going to have this kind of unique experience and get to learn and appreciate the art of working with silver?

A must do class in Ubud. This was an amazing class run by very helpful, skillful and patient people. My daughter and I had an awesome day and 3 hours flew by. We both were very happy with what we made and will definitely be going back for more.

A wonderful, unique experience!. I went to Chez Monique by myself while my boyfriend was off bike-riding. It was a truly unique and personal experience designing and producing a piece of jewellery to take home. Everytime I look at the ring on my finger I am reminded of my trip to Bali. After a long walk I was greeted with water and a seat in front of the fan while I flipped through their idea books. I then got to work making my piece, being shown what to do and then given the opportunity to do it myself. I'd recommend this class to anyone - such a different experience than all the normal 'tourist' stuff. Loved it!

A lovely morning well spent!!. We pre booked on the phone for an 11am class for two of us, we were greeted with hugs and drinking water! Plenty of ideas were supplied for our inspiration to design our piece, one pendant and one ring made with a lot of care, time and patience from everyone, absolutely loved this experience and for the price it costs, it's very much worth it!

Great Experience!!!. It was definitely well worth going to this silver smith class! You get to design your own jewellery piece and produce it to your exact liking. Even if you are not very artistic, you can base your design on some of the examples provided, and the great staff will help with all the trickier parts! It is so satisfying leaving Chez Monique with your own unique jewellery to take home with you! Thank you to Wayan and the helpful staff!!

Surprisingly good. Girlfriend wanted to go here as part of her birthday, I was a little apprehensive being both rubbish at anything artistic and not being overly bothered about jewellery however I ended up having a great time.The place was fairly busy when we arrived but there where plenty of staff on hand to help out, they take you through the numerous different stages of development and give you a guiding hand if like me your pretty useless.I ended up walking away with a really nice necklace that I'd made (mostly) myself and my girlfriend with some lovely ear rings.
Jewelry Class. Great jewelry workshop. I made a necklace I will wear in 2 hours. Very helpful staff. A definite plus to my trip to Bali- great memory.

Simple amazing!. What a wonderful way to spend an afternoon designing your own jewellery! We had an amazing time, designing and creating something beautiful and personal from Bali, would definitely recommend! The guys couldn't help us enough, polishing our designs to look like shop bought items 10 out of 10!!!!

Truly Unique Experience. As a jeweller, I spend a week working with Wayan, learning how to make traditional Balinese silver jewelry. Such an inspiring environment and excellent staff to guide you, I highly recommend Chez Monique.

Day well spent!. We had such a ball making our very own piece of silver! The people are lovely and very helpful, we would recommend this to anyone and everyone! Worthwhile experience! Thank you Chez Monique for a day well spent!

Take a piece of Ubud home with you. I had an amazing afternoon at Chez Monique! I went alone, and had no idea what I wanted to make. There were loads of inspiring photo books to provide ideas, but once I decided, it was up to me to design and draw my piece, so it would be my very own original pendant.The staff are super helpful, knowledgeable, friendly and happy. After chatting with Wayan, we learned that he had just spent a long vacation in my home of Oregon. He brought out the photo album and we looked through all of the pics of he and his wife playing in snow and wine tasting. It was fun to share.I'm super happy with my pendant, and am happy I drew it myself. It's a true one of a kind!

Wonderful silver jewellery-making workshop. Three of us went to Chez Monique on Monday morning and had a terrific time. It was very peaceful and relaxing as we were working next to the garden and could hear the birds singing. There were lots of designs for inspiration, and the staff were very friendly and helpful. Two of us made pendants and one person made a ring. A special thank you for giving my elderly mother so much assistance. The class was great value and highly recommended if you want to do something creative and take a break from the hustle and bustle of Ubud.

Relaxed, enjoyable, beautiful jewellery class!. Loved being able to choose/design out own jewellery and make it from silver within just a couple hours. Well run by super friendly guys. Highly recommended!

Create a memory to keep and have fun doing it!. Chez Monique silver class was the BEST! I found it online, read the reviews and it exceeded expectations.I have had an interest in Jewellery making for a while and this seemed like a great opportunity to learn. In the end my boyfriend joined the class too - he's more the surfing fishing type but he loved it! Our teachers Echo and Monty (so sorry I think that is the wrong name) were fantastic and helped every step of the way.Wyan is a really nice guy and oversees the class but he hurt his ankle badly the day we were there. Even so he took a great interest in what we were making and made sure we had a great experience.We took our own gemstones and did some research before the class so we were prepared with design ideas and ready to go. We made two rings and two pendants. All turned out very well - totally professional! We had a fantastic time making some beautiful pieces. I will post photos of what we made. Thanks again to the guys at Chez Monique for a fantastic experience, we will be back next time we are in Bali!

Spent an amazing and relaxing morning here!. My girlfriend and I spent a morning with Wayan and his team and it was great! Greeted and sent off with hugs, we felt very welcomed throughout the entire process. We got a little lost getting there so showed up a little late but that was no problem because the class is pretty informal and they'll help you create whatever you want! Our pieces turned out fabulous and look store-bought! Couldn't be happier. Thanks!

Fabulous, welcoming, great experience. We, a family of 5, loved the experience. They were patient and taught my 5 and 7 year old what to do and let them help so much with their creations. My husband and I were equally thrilled with our products! Ps. There is a vat of acid atop a table used in the silver process. They warned us about it, but after 30 minutes or so. I probably would have wanted to know right away to warn my kids even sooner.

Loved it. I took the course as a treat for myself for my birthday. As a solo I was made very welcome and even given a hug hello and goodbye.Wayan and the team were lovely and ready to help whenever needed, forever encouraging. I would highly recommend this as something nice and different to do in ubud!

Fabulous experience. My husband and I spent another wonderful experience with Wayan Sunarta and his lovely staff.We arrived and he met us with his warm and friendly smile. We discussed what we wanted to do and he was so interested and encouraging and made the whole experience unique for us.We came away with 2 beautiful pieces of jewellery that we will treasure.This was our second visit to Chez Monique silver smith class and will not be our last! A must to do in Ubud, can throughly recommend it, extremely intrinsic experience.

It's just a miracle!. Everything was really amazing! Teachers are the best: friendly, kind, attentive. I enjoyed every moment in this studio. And the main thing is actually: you can make almost masterpiece yourself! So, highly recommend!

A truly wonderful experience. My husband and myself spent a wonderful few hours with Wayan designing and making pendents for each other for our 20th wedding anniversary.Wayan is such a genuine, warm soul and had so much patience. We were a little late and were concerned that we had missed the 'start time' but Wayan was great and managed to give us his full attention and was also able to assist the others in the class.We didn't feel we were to any time limit and could of stayed longer if we had needed to.What I really loved was that the class wasn't held in the back of a shop in central Ubud, it was in the family complex and this was just magical with a beautiful feel about the place.Nothing was too much trouble for Wayan and he has given me the confidence to attend again next time we are in Bali to make something more complex. Thank you so much for making our Wedding Anniversary so memorable.

Great way to spend a morning !. My girlfriends and I spent a lovely morning with Wayan and his team creating our pendants - all so different and uniquely ours !It was great visiting the family compound and the atmosphere was very relaxed. Whether you haven't a clue what to do or a complex design they guide you to ensure that you have a professionally finished piece at the end. Definitely recommend this as a great activity to try.

A fun & new experience. Create something fun & surprisingly easy in an afternoon with Wayan & his team of assistants. Wayan's jewellery classes are held in his beautiful family home compound close to the market end of Ubud. Simple enough to keep my 9 year old niece enthusiastically absorbed all afternoon & equally fun for all the adults as well. With many, many designs to choose from there is something for everyone, or if you'd prefer to really try your hand at the craft you can design your own creation. Reasonably priced for an enjoyable afternoon.

Wonderful & patient tutors!. Spend an afternoon making jewellery in the most relaxing atmosphere. Its a small workshop within a home and the tutors helping you make your ideal jewellery are really patient and very helpful, with lots of smiles!It was therapeutic and rather relaxing making my own pendant, plus its situated further in from the main street which gave it a nice and quite setting to work in.

An intersting and unusal way to spend the morning. We booked this silver smithing course for our holiday as we wanted to a) know that we had something planned to do during our time in Ubud 2) do something we had never done before that would give us an experience we would never forget.We were warmly welcomed and given drinks on arrival and the team were keen to help us make something we would love to take away with us.The course is simple enough for anyone to do and the team have several folders full of hundreds of designs that you can chose from to make. The complexity and size of what you make is up to you but do be aware that if you use more silver than is included in the price you may end up paying a little more for your item of jewellery.We were fully supervised and supported during our time and the staff helped us with all the difficult bits. Do read the emails properly and make sure you go to the workshop. I didn't and ended up at the shop which is over the other side of the main street!I would definitely do this again.

Unique and different.. Foreword: Chez Monique Silver Smithing Classes comes highly recommended with a warm and friendly host. Located in a beautiful traditional Balinese family compound (yes it is their home) that gives a lovely atmosphere to work in. There are many designs in many folders to choose from if you are a little creatively challenged.Allow 2-3 hours for this activity and recommend this as combination activity for Ubud.Pros: Very friendly and accomodating staff.  Good amount of tools and equipment. Quiet location. Close to Ubud township and Sacred Monkey Forest. Excellent value.Cons: Could interact with students a little better. Allow students to finish projects to learn the whole process rather that take over and finish it for them.Final words: I would recommend Chez Monique's friendly and accommodating classes to both the timid and the adventurous alike.

Uniquely wonderful experience!. Found this based on other reviews. We ended up making a custom pendant from a picture on my phone. The staff were very knowledgeable, helpful and friendly! Would recommend to any traveller!

So much fun. After hitting traffic we arrived really late for the class. They were really nice and took it completely in stride. I made some earrings while my friend made a pendant. They helped from the ideas stage all the way along and I was surprised how well everything turned out. There were some people there who had come back the next day to make more things. Absolutely loved it, definitely one of the best things in Bali. The sign from the road is very small so watch for the street number.

a wonderful experience!. I recently experienced a wonderful morning with Wayan, his family and staff at his family compound in Ubud. We were all welcomed and a delightful experience enfolded. Everyone from teenager to older participant were treated with love and encouraged to create their own design or a copy of an idea from numerous ideas/designs that they have on hand. A wonderful experience for young and old. Thank you Wayan

Pleasantly surprised with the interaction and quality of class. My girlfriend and I arrived at Chez Monique around 20 minutes late but we received an extremely warm welcome from the owner, offering us a hug, a drink and then seated us at our workstation with template booklets to choose a design from. (Although we chose our own design, drawing our own template)A number of helpers are available to assist you with making your design but also allowing you to do as much of the making yourself as you like. I broke a number of blades cutting out my design but it wasn't an issue and a new one arrived with a smile.This experience, set in the home of the owner, which had a very local touch to it making it authentic and not touristy but still somehow very accommodating.As my girlfriends design was a little larger we paid a bit extra but for the time, effort and amount of silver that we received but it was more than worth it - can't quite believe how affordable this is for the whole experience and to come away with a personalised keepsake of Bali.A highlight of our trip.

Lovely morning spent. I was afraid to attend the class at first, but I ended up having a fun time making my whale pendant. Wayan and his staffs helped me a lot, guiding me when I'm unsure. They were very assuring and encouraging too! It would be good if you have ideas/designs beforehand. Not to worry if you have none, they have lots of designs to choose from. I will definitely be back to do another class when I'm back next year! Thank you again!

Thoroughly enjoyed!. I had a lovely time wandering up the street to find a quiet oasis at Wayans home compound...I was welcomed and given some designs to consider. I made a circular pendant with patient tuition from a silversmith and wear it proudly . Thank you Wayans and your staff

Perfect experience. I accidentally stumbled across this activity on trip advisor - so glad I did because it was the perfect afternoon activity and I did it on my own:) chez and his family were the most beautiful people and really let you go at your own pace or lend a helping hand! I suggest getting a scooter there cos I walked and it was very hot and I almost missed it because it's just a small sign out the front!

An easy-paced step-by-step class. In a quiet peaceful area of Ubud, not too far from main street, Wayan and his staff were very helpful and instructive in helping us to make our first piece of silver jewellery. I made a pendant and my teen daughter made a ring, they look very professional and I would never guess they were made by novices. All assistance given when required. Suggestions for design available if you don't take your own.

Fun experience. My husband and I enjoyed making a necklace and a ring here. I would suggest coming to the appointment with a couple ideas about what you want to make - bringing photos with you would allow you to get started right away. We had never made any silver jewelry before and we ended up with 2 nice pieces to take home with us. I suggest calling when you first arrive in Ubud to schedule this experience into your trip. We did not have our teenagers with us, but they would have definitely enjoyed this.

A marvellous experience in Ubud. The Chez Monique Silver Jewellery workshop is one of the best value for money deals in Bali. For a very reasonable price you can make your own jewellery piece to take home as a personal reminder of your time in Bali. Wayan, the master silversmith and his staff are so patient and encouraging and draw out your creative spirit. My 8 year old niece even made a beautiful pendant with the help of Wayan and his team. My sister didn't want to take part originally, but has since told me it was one of her most memorable experiences in Bali.
Special experience. What a great place, special memories and a unique piece of jewlery to take home. All of the jewelers were so helpful and patient.

Great morning, just do it you won't regret it.. We did the class this morning, made two beautiful rings under the careful guidance of Wayan and another silversmith. We were made to feel so welcome, and our rings really turned out lovely. This is a must do experience when you visit Ubud!

Brilliant Morning. My friend and I spent the morning with Wayan and his team making rings at his silver class. I was unsure I would be able to make anything with a good result. But the process was straight forward and easy to follow with patience. I was very happy with the end result of my ring. Thank you to Wayan and his team for helping us bring out our creative flair!

Great Experience. My husband and I are not particularly crafty, but Wayan and his staff are very helpful and make us feel at ease making our rings. It was a great experience making one of a kind jewelry to remember this great trip to Bali. I can't wait to take my kids back there again next time, as I know, especially my creative daughter, will enjoy the experience tremendously. For those who are interested, appointment is required and they close on holidays and Sundays.

Excellent. Thoroughly enjoyed our experience. Even received a warm welcoming hug from Wayan on our arrival. I am not creative at all and was so excited to walk away with a lovely piece of jewellery. Everything one there were friendly, helpful and patient. Great way to spend a few hours. I highly recommend Chez Monique!! :) :)

Enjoyable . We visited Chez Monique for a great morning of jewellery making! Was unsure when I booked whether of not I'd be able to make anything as I am not in the least 'arty'! Didn't need to worry as there were folders to go through to get ideas and Wayan and the boys were incredibly patient and helpful.Would absolutely recommend a morning/afternoon with Wayan - it's worth it

Excellent!!!. We arrived at Wayan's house last week, what a lovely setting! We were made very welcome, Wayan is such a friendly host, he helped us make two pieces of jewellery, very patient man!! We will be back next year for sure. Dave and Derrilee

Go on, surprise yourself!. I had seen the Chez Monique jewellery class in Lonely Planet Traveller magazine and was keen to do it before we reached Bali. Stupidly, I didn't contact Wayan until our last day but he managed to squeeze us in that afternoon - and I'm so glad he did! The compound is a nice 10-15 minute slow stroll from central Ubud. It is interesting to see how a Balinese family lives and you are greeted with a warm smile and hug from Wayan, plus a welcome cold drink! There are tons of books of designs to look through for inspiration, or you can sketch your own design out.
